232b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams byin pa byin
232b6(mdo sde): pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugasu byas pa mthong na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med
232b7(mdo sde): par bskyed do// thal mo sbyar ba 'am/ me tog gam gdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyedado//
232b8(mdo sde): 'jas dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ skal pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
233a1(mdo sde): pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang / de bzhin du lha'i na bza rnams phul ba bas
233a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la/ sangs rgyas
233a3(mdo sde): la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin cig phan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal
233a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu po gang la la zhig gis skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'am byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi kham
233a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul sbed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
233a6(mdo sde): mo gzhan gang zhig gis glang po che'i shing rta'i bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na
233a7(mdo sde): nyin cig zan cig byin na yang / 'di ni des ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
233a8(mdo sde): sted du glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro rgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin
233b1(mdo sde): du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyis bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
233b2(mdo sde): gcig la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yong su 'dzin te/ tha na nyi ma cig zan cig byin na/ yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal
233b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams thams cad
233b4(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin gyis dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams byin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
233b5(mdo sde): gang zhig gis/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal
233b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md kyi
233b7(mdo sde): rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang
233b8(mdo sde): zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyan cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam
234a1(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub
234a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi kham thaMd kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams byin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam
234a3(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'gri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
234a4(mdo sde): grangs med par bskyed do// bzlog ste sti stang ma byas pa'i mi rke ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro
234a5(mdo sde): ba dang / glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba 'ang de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi
234a6(mdo sde): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
234a7(mdo sde): rnam kyi bar chad bya ba bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig
234a8(mdo sde): la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs
234b1(mdo sde): med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tha~Md kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas/
234b2(mdo sde): 'dog pa thams cad 'phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par smra ba dang /
234b3(mdo sde): snyogs par byed na de bas ches sdig pa mang du bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyis bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas rnyas pa
234b4(mdo sde): skyed de spyos na/ de mi dge ba'i las des/ sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro// de'i mgo re re
234b5(mdo sde): la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re re la yang mthong ba shol lnga rgya lnga rgya rmod par 'gyur te/ dang 'jam dpal rig
234b6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams rnamasu skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon kyis snun te
234b7(mdo sde): bdog pa thams cad phrags pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lta brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na/ khro ba dang gnod sems dpa
234b8(mdo sde): tha ba dang / khros pa'i sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sdang ba'i sems
235a1(mdo sde): sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang /
235a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcod pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs pus yongs su skor cing / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan btsugs pa gang
235a3(mdo sde): gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag shig pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la spro 'dogs te/
235a4(mdo sde): bsdus pa'i sems skyed nas rkyen cis kyang rung / khro ba dang gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
235a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' las/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur ba des chos spangs pa
235a6(mdo sde): yin no// chos kyang gzhan yang / chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
235a7(mdo sde): gang la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can btson ra mun nag tu bcug pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/ byang
235a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas/ ma rungs pa 'di mi lta'o zhes zer na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig
235b1(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad kyi 'dog pa thams cad phyogs pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba
235b2(mdo sde): la smod/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang yangs pa dang / che bas ri thams
235b3(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lha me ldan lha de'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang /
235b4(mdo sde): che bas phyogs bcu dag na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pa
235b5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung bskal pa grangs med par stsags pa zil gis mnan nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
235b6(mdo sde): gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems la bkod pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/
235b7(mdo sde): phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos pa/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas/
235b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog tu
236a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos na 'dzin par byed cing / mar me dang / me tog dang / gdugs pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams
236a2(mdo sde): kyis mchod par byed/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
236a3(mdo sde): cad du gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams dang /
236a4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rtsa bya rnams chung bsan pa pas/ gzhan gang
236a5(mdo sde): zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed na/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi
236a6(mdo sde): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ mchod rten gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gshig pa dang / sregs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis theg
236a7(mdo sde): pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems skyed do// gshe ba dang mi snyan par smra na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par
236a8(mdo sde): skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/ sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing / sangs rgyas las
236b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la/ sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang
236b2(mdo sde): ma byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang ma byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par
236b3(mdo sde): bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya 'am/ bye ba stong ngam/ bye ba rgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa dag yod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs
236b4(mdo sde): 'di la ma mos na/ de dag gi las ni rgyal po 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am/ chus 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ chom rkun gyis 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges 'khrug par
236b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yod
236b6(mdo sde): na de'i las ni skal ba grangs med par mtsham med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur/ grong khyer der bye bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi las rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur pa mi 'gyur/ chus
236b7(mdo sde): 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / chom rkun gyis 'khrug pa'i 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mu ges 'khrug pa'i las mi 'byung / mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur
236b8(mdo sde): ba'i las mi 'byung la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las skal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na
237a1(mdo sde): der 'khrug par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las skal pa grangs med pa brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i las skal pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu nga/
237a2(mdo sde): song myong bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ste/ 'khrug par byang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bstsags pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i
237a3(mdo sde): rdzi nga yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba la dug srang stong yang mi 'dug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chus phung po ches rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par/ sems can dmyal ba dang
237a4(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po lcags pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
237a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid
237a6(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gang gi mkhan pa
237a7(mdo sde): su len tra b+ho ti dang / zhu chen gyi lo tso ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ga ga na gan dza pa ri bring tshan ma mahAn su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags nam/ kha/ mdzod
237a8(mdo sde): kyis pa zhes pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
237b1(mdo sde): pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin po chen bkod pa'i 'khor gi khyams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsod nams chen po'i rgyan
237b2(mdo sde): kyi tsho gas rtsegs pa/ spyod pa chen po'i rgyu mthun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin pas mngon par sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas
237b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa nges par snyan pa/ de bzhin de shes par rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs mi chags pa'i spyod yul gi ye shes la 'jug pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po rab tu skyed
237b4(mdo sde): pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa la 'jug pa/ kun nas ma spang pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par spyod do// de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i
237b5(mdo sde): skal par mngon bstod pa yon gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni/ mngom par rdzogs par sangs
237b6(mdo sde): rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu skor slob ma'i shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tsho gas ni mnga' chos thams cad la ni mnga' rnyes/ sems can thams cad
237b7(mdo sde): kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni byas/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu byon/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'jom pa la ni mkhas/
237b8(mdo sde): shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma chad do// dge slong sa ya phrag drug gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad
238a1(mdo sde): kyang cang shes pa kyi sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pa'i sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa
238a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom pa la rtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par
238a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs
238a4(mdo sde): pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ grangs med
238a5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad med brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams
238a6(mdo sde): cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro
238a7(mdo sde): bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos mnyan pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la rtson pa/
238a8(mdo sde): thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sgrib med pa'i rnam par thar pa/ la rab tu gnas pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / spros pa thams cad
238b1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lha zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
238b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnab
238b3(mdo sde): par gnon pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis yang dag 'jom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par sgrags ldan zhes bya ba dang /
238b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang / chu byang chub sems dpa' mun pa dang bral ba dang / de dag la rtsogs byang chub sems dpa' sems
238b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab ma chud pa med/ gzhan la du med/ dpag gis mi lang / rjod du med pa/ ngag dang
238b6(mdo sde): yang thabs gi cag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
238b7(mdo sde): pa rab tu ston te/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khor cing / bkod pa chen po'i khang pa rtsegs
238b8(mdo sde): pa'i nang na ba dag 'dug pa ste du sheso// khang pa rtsegs pa dag gi bkod pa de nyid semacan nA kyi mig sngar snang ba 'gyur te khang pa rtseg pa na 'khod pa byang chub sde dpa' chen po rnam dang / nyan thos
238b9(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / ga'adi yang gang srung / gnod sbyin de dri za'i 'khor de dag pas/
239a1(mdo sde): cad ma gtog gsuM gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzugs snang ba lhag ma gzhan tham cad med par gyur te/ thams cad kyang na mkha' lta bur sheso// 'di lta ste dben skas pa shin tu sreb
239a2(mdo sde): te ra mkha' bzhin gyur pa na ston gsuM gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi kha m+ba ra/ gzugasu snang ba gang yang mig lngar sna bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na gang gzugasu snang ba rdzas sems can dag gi mig sngar
239a3(mdo sde): be snang bar 'gyur to// 'di lta ste dben de bzhin gsheg pa rin po rje bkod pa gcig pa 'jig rten gyi kham bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sos dang de dge la pa ces pa yongasu ma spyod pa de dra gi nga
239a4(mdo sde): brtseg pa de na snang // daM mkha la khA brtseg pa 'dug pa de dag ma rtog pa/ stong gsuM gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi kham 'di sa'i stong dang / gzhi'i bA du thos cad kyang mi snang snyam du rab tu shes te ri'i rgyal po rib dang /
239a5(mdo sde): 'khor yu gi ri dang / 'khor yu gi ri chen po de dag sems can gang gi mig lngar swA mi snang ba cung / grong dang grong khyer dang / gro ba rdal dang / ldong dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal grwa pha brang rnamA mi snang ste/ gzhan du na mkhi'i dkyil na gnas
239a6(mdo sde): pa'i khang pa rtse gra pa de dag nyid shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ni 'phang du dpag chad khris 'phag pa rab tu sna ngo // gang la bco ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri do 'od kyi kyang stong ga suM gyi stong cen
239a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// gang stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / rgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
239a8(mdo sde): 'od de dag thaMd kyang mog phog par byas par gyuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thaMd kyis 'di lta bu'i mo 'phrul ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba mthong nas phan tshun du smra ba khang brtseg pa
239a9(mdo sde): 'di'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni bdag gi ci'i tshad skal par 'dug par gyur bdag cag gis rgya zer rnam par bye bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ de tsam du 'ang brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bking
239b1(mdo sde): chen po ni tshad med do zhes 'dzer to// de na macom ldan 'das kyis mthus rtan sha ri'i bu khang pa rtse ga pa de nas langs/ na mkha' la 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lhan btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga le ba de
239b2(mdo sde): log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' la mchis pa li khang tsags pa 'di ma lag pa gzhan stong gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
239b3(mdo sde): gyi khams thos cad nam gar gyur cing / na mkha'i rang bzhin du gdar ba 'di su'i snga ltas lag/ bcoM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyi khang pa ce bra 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa btsa
239b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyis khang brtsegs pa 'di dag gi sngags pa yongasu brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus ma/ gsol pa bcom ldan
239b5(mdo sde): 'das bang gi tshe'i tshad bas par gyur par khang pa rtsegs pa 'di dag sngags par mi nuso// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu ji ltar 'di dag thas cad na mkha' la song zhing khang pa rtsegs
239b6(mdo sde): pa bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang ba bzhin du bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi khang pa rtsegs pa de yang 'di 'dra'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i
239b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis khams de gang gi phyogs na mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa shi ri'i bya de ni 'di nas shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdal gyis yongasu
239b8(mdo sde): gang ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da ltar
239b9(mdo sde): ra bzhugs te 'tsho zhi bzhi la chos kyang ston to// sha ri bu bkod pa chen dri 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub kyi sos rin po che gzhan mi 'byung // de shwa re re bani gle bla pari po ni bcwo pa gcig pa zhes bya'o/ de bzhin gsheg pa de snga nam kyang
239b10(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi
240a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag la chos chad pa de na seng ge'i khri dang bcas te ta la bye ba phrag rgya cu srid nas ka'i dkyil du mngon par 'phagaso// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa rtsegs pa bkod pa chen
240a2(mdo sde): po der na mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phagaso nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang na mkha'i dkyil yongasasu dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to// sha ri'i bu bkod
240a3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa rtse ga pa'i yongasu long spyod pa de ni skal bar rjod mi nuso/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i seng ge'i khri 'di mthong ngam/ gsol ba bcom ldan
240a4(mdo sde): 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa de gcig pa de'i seng ge'i khri yang 'di 'dra ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas/
240a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa na mkha'i dkyil yong su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dab par rab tu ston to// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa na mkha'i dkyil
240a6(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/ 'di ste/ dngos po med pas chos thams cad yod pa dang / med pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /
240a7(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa med pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang / rgyu dang dmigs pa med pas/ chos thams cad snang bar gyur par med pa/ nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dmigs
240a8(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / gnyi su med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / so sor thar pa med pas chos thams cad gnyi su med pa dang tshul gcig la bzhugs pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang /
240a9(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / bral ngas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / thams cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad
240b1(mdo sde): nam nga kyis dang / thams cad du mi sdang ngas/ cho mas cad mi gnas pa'i blo dang yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad sna nga med pa dang / nang dang byi rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul
240b2(mdo sde): med pa dang / rang bzhin gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pas/ ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar zhi nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi yongasasu dag pa dang / sems dang yid/ rnam par shes
240b3(mdo sde): pa med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / bzod ma nas ma byung bas/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / nga'i ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad bzod ma nas ma byung ba dang /
240b4(mdo sde): bdag po med pas chos thams cad nga'i ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag po med pa dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang
240b5(mdo sde): bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang / ldog pa med pas chos thams cad bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin pas chos thams cad ldog pa med pa/ dngos po med pas chos thams cad sgyu
240b6(mdo sde): ma lta bu dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang sems dang lus dben pas chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mtshan nyid med cing
240b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med pas/ chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / gnas dmigasu su med pas chos thams
240b8(mdo sde): cad ma g.yos pa dang / dmig su med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas/ chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang / kun zhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa/ ku zhi dang bral bas chos
240b9(mdo sde): thams cad kun zhi med pa ste/ sha ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'jug
240b10(mdo sde): pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te
241a1(mdo sde): de thos pas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod so/ chos thams cad la dbang rjesu
241a2(mdo sde): 'thob po// yang sha ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing skal pa grangs med par rtong pa'i rjes su song
241a3(mdo sde): baHtshul khrims kyis rgyan cing blo shin tu byang ba/ bzod pas rgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang / ldan pa rtson 'grus kyis rgyan cing sangs
241a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshogs stsags pa/ bsam gtan gyis rgyan cing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon
241a5(mdo sde): par shes pa thams cad kyi rnam par brtson pa/ shes rab kyis rgyun cing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos rgyan
241a6(mdo sde): cing sems can thams cad yongasu skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje chen pos rgyan cing sems can thams cad mi yongasu mi gtong bar gnas pa/ dga' ba chen pos brgyan
241a7(mdo sde): cing sems cad thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ btang snyoms chen pos rgyan cing sems can thams cad
241a8(mdo sde): mi mtho mi dma' ba la dgod pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go// yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de sangs
241a9(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha' mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis shin tu rjod pa/ ye shes mthong ba
241a10(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa/ mtshon rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po rnams kyis byams brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag rgyan pa/ gzugs kyis sems brgyan gzog
241b1(mdo sde): pas dran pa rgyan ga/ nges par sems pas dben pargyan pa rtogs pas den rtogs pa brgyan/ rtsams pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/ khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa rgyan pa
241b2(mdo sde): sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tsam med par gyur pa/ btang snyoms chen pos rgyan cing mthon dman med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing / rdzu
241b3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa bsod nams kyis brgyan cing / lag na rin po che gtong ba mngon par grub pa ye shes kyis brgyan cing / sems
241b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems kyi bas pa la zhugs pa/ blo brgyan cing sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rtog par byed pa/ mig gis rgyan cing / mig lnga'i yul shin tu rnam par dag
241b5(mdo sde): garna bas rgyan cing sgra dang don thas cad rtogs pa snying po dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas rgyan cing / don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so sor yang
241b6(mdo sde): dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa stob kyis rgyan cing de bzhin gshes pa'i stob bcu rje su 'thob pa/ mi 'jig pas rgyan cing phas kyi rgol ba thos cad kyis zil kyis mi non pa/
241b7(mdo sde): yon tan gyis brgyan cing sang+yas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa chos kyis rgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa so sor rig pa'i rje su song ba/ snang bas rgyan cing
241b8(mdo sde): sang+yas kyi chos thams cad lab mthil du thob pa/ 'od kyis rgyan cing sang+yas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa/ kun nas ston pas rgyan cing byed par lung ston pa/ ga dpra
241b9(mdo sde): pa dang / rjes su ston pas rgyan cing de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul gyis rgyan cing / rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnaM par grol ba/ thams
241b10(mdo sde): cang ston pa/ sang+yas thos cad kyis mngon par stod pas rgyan cing / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i yi sa la gnas pa chog thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyan cing sang+yas thams
241b11(mdo sde): zad kyims 'dul ba'i rjes thub pa ste/ sha re'i du gang bkod pa 'di lta bu su tu snang ba 'di ri byang chub sems dpa' nam la' mdzod kyi byid gyi rlabs// ka ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
241b12(mdo sde): chen po na mkha' mjed de nga la ltadang
244a1(mdo sde): / mi sdang bzhin// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzug ni gzug nyid mtshang // chos de gzug dang gzug med gzugs min mtshan nyid/ gang gis de ltar don rnam yang dag dben rtog pa//
244a2(mdo sde): dzi tsaM N+Dal bI sdug pa de dag gi dpe bgyid pa// de dag tshad sdug pa 'di mthong nag te// rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren sngag nam kha 'dre// gnyis med sdug brjod 'di ni rgyal ba'i sdug pa'o// sangs 'gro ba dam pa
244a3(mdo sde): mdzad cing dmig med pa// sems meng sos nyid rnyas pa khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// ji ltar 'dren pa kun gI mI sde ge sdug/ de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan sdug/ sos can thaMd bdag med mtshar nyid ye she maH/
244a4(mdo sde): dzad rtog pas chos dpyid rjes rig par bgyid// chos kun 'dod chag bral ba'i mtshan gyi tshul shes pa// des ni mnye ba nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sem dpa seMs rab chen po na mkha' mdzod
244a5(mdo sde): kyis tshig su bcang po 'di dag smras ma thag tu mamakhara' la 'dug pa'i khengs brtseg pa bkod pa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// bar snang las kyang gang sangs bcoM ldan 'das rnam skal ba grang med
244a6(mdo sde): ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par sbang ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub de ni/ byang chub semA dpa sos dpa' chen po rnam lnga mdzod kyi tshig su bcad pa'i dpyad kyis kun brjod/
244a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dbu de dag ni rmi lam na yang mngon par zhen pas dmig pA lta ba mi 'byung // gang dag tshog su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ mos pa dang gang yang mthos nas sgrud pa de dag ni
244a8(mdo sde): ji ltar byang chub sos dpa na mkha' mdzod de ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du/ de dag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod
244a9(mdo sde): kyis nis su bcang pa 'di dag smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen pa'i le'u chos kyi chos kyi dgrang 'drim thos nas/
244b1(mdo sde): mi brjed kyi 'jig rten gyis kham 'dir bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bstan bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang chos snang bar brtsi ba dang
244b2(mdo sde): chung zad snyan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rang rang gis chos la the tsom du gyur pa nges par stan pa/
244b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongasu zhus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i bla la rab tu gnas pas de dag gi the tsom tha~Md kyang rab tu bsal cing sa rgyas kyi chos tha~Md
244b4(mdo sde): snang bar bgyis pa de leg so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gsheg pas bdag la skab phye na chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pi bka' mchid cung zad cig bdag zhu'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/
244b5(mdo sde): bco ldan 'das ni mi 'chag pa'i ye shes can te/ sros can thaMd kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma log pa mkhyen pa yis la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba rnyes te/ mun pa tha
244b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ bco ldan 'das ni don mkhyen pa ste/ nri thang ra tu dbye ba ni las la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa ste/ tshod las mi 'ang shing byed par srung sto ga bso na
244b7(mdo sde): 'das ni slong mkhyen pa ste/ sos can dadas sa sa the gas par tsas spyon pa/ bcos tud ni na rol pa ste/ mngon pa shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi nang pa rnam blanges pa'i shes sa mkhas pa bcoldan
244b8(mdo sde): ni nyi rnam par gzigs pa'i gro nga ldan pa ste/ sas cad kyi sems kyi stong ba byig la du ga bkun gyis na la chen yo pa cag pa / badrus ma ga tshan
244b9(mdo sde): khyim yo pa / gang bdu gyim yin pa'i gi las das mi sa 'i khol las ni gru te// ga saso/
245a1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa nas la yang dag pa'i las ston pa/ bcom ldan
245a2(mdo sde): 'das ni sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu sgrib pa dang / shin tu sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang bas bslabs pa'i 'jig rten
245a3(mdo sde): 'das pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen
245a4(mdo sde): ba la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa rnyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'jigs pa chen po zhes pa ste/ zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te kun nA
245a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa la mkhas pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas
245a6(mdo sde): kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes can/ bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs yongasu dag pa ste/ 'khrul pa dang
245a7(mdo sde): co mi mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang rnams par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe 'dras
245a8(mdo sde): pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ namakha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni thugs de
245a9(mdo sde): gnas pa ste/ le par byas pa dang / shes par byas padag bde ba dang / thug bsngal pas mi skyob/ seMm can thams cad la marnam par 'jug pa'i bu dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'a ni sangs sas cadas
245b1(mdo sde): salcug+sa smra suhA ga 'an
245b2(mdo sde): rab kyis ngom pa rnyed pa dang / gang dang / rjem cu bcad pa dang bral gib tsa ldan 'das nams cang mabyed pams cadag kyigag/ spyan rje'i rgyal yong sa dag pa mo btsan 'das de sar de na ga byeb pa nas
245b3(mdo sde): chos dang ye shwe tshan ma mchis pa dang ldan par bdags rig nas/ chos rab tu rjod pa'i sgo yongasu zhu pA 'tshal te/ bus pa dang bcas shing chos la cesu bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing seMs can bas nga/
245b4(mdo sde): chos la sbyor ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shwe kI mngon par sgrubs pas/ chos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongasu zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcoM ldan 'das kyis byang chub sem dpa' sos dpa' chen po na mkha'
245b5(mdo sde): mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// leg so legaso// skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs bcom ldan 'das rnams lung snyan pa thos pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin ga bye ba la dris
245b6(mdo sde): shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid lung snyan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur to// 'dug pa dag
245b7(mdo sde): byang chub seMs dpa' sas dpa' chen po rnamakha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// ci zhig gi phyir rig kyi bu khyod de bzhin gabye ba la zhu bar 'dod de nas byang chub sos dpa' bos dpa' chen po rnamakha' mdzod kyis / byang chub sos/
245b8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigasu bcad pas slar smras pa/ gang rnams sem la yid mtshungs pa/ shin tu bsam sems ye shes mnyam la gnas/ sems la sem
245b9(mdo sde): sa mas ga kyi ma sa kya pa #
246a1(mdo sde): da na kur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen mtshas sa kyinas grangs 'di pa sa su 'azung bar baphyags gyur 'ag tshangams nas 'das pa gyi chu pas a
246a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di 'apa / rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sos dpa' thams cad kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongs su bzung ba'i phyir
246a3(mdo sde): nga'i gan du 'ong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkad pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/ byang chub ses dpa' thams cad kyi bye phrag bcu gnyis
246a4(mdo sde): kyis yong su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rkang pas bkod pa chen nu po'i 'jig rten
246a5(mdo sde): gyi khams de nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig 'byung ba tsam gyis mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gi khabs 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten
246a6(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba char rab tu phra ba 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin
246a7(mdo sde): tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rab tu 'bar ba dang / me shel dang / 'dog mdzes dang / sa deg mdzes chen po dang / mdog mdzes par 'dug pa dang / dpal chen po dang / dpal rab mdzes dang / dri
246a8(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / kun tu dri ma med pa dang / rnam par 'od dang / gser du snang dang / nam mkha' snang dang / reg gyur dang / dri chen dkar dang / mde'i brgya pa dang / ze stong ldan dang / mya ngan sel
246a9(mdo sde): ba dang / dga' byed dang / lhas stang ba dang / klu'i me tog dang dka' bkun skyed pa dang / bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris rga dang / lus sems tshim byed dang / stong gsu dri dag na da kun te
246a10(mdo sde): sa pa gi sa tha kyis sa kyis thu sa byas chum sems papa sa kyi
246b1(mdo sde): byamang chen pa'i 'angagi rten gyi khams 'din du zhems par byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la pa thal lab thams pad du sag khrus pa nu pa gyur /
246b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon mthas ma mtho me tig mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog ldan sdug pa 'di dag ga las mchis/
246b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod de/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/
246b4(mdo sde): de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis pa de dag dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom
246b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsuM bskor ba byas te/ bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rarin po chen po'i bkod pa gcig pa ni/ bco ldan 'das la gnod pa chung /
246b6(mdo sde): ma ra gu raM/ bskyod pa yang de/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzad la stsogs pa/ byang chub
246b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing / chen po dang ldan nas/ slar
246b8(mdo sde): ldog par gyur pa'i chos kyi ka mchid kyis/ bco ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod cig ces de skad ces kyang gsung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bcom
246b9(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khwa'i steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs byin gyis rlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal me sbyar te phyag 'tshal
246b10(mdo sde): nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dgagis mngon po ldan 'das la 'di skad sa pAR+Ya stod
247a1(mdo sde): / 'chos dang don dang yan na dang / yan tan 'a lags pas na/ yongs dag rnam dag ldanas dag cing dri ma med/ gnas myed nam ma' 'dra bar byig yo rab tu rnyeg/ rabazang kun nas spyad
247a2(mdo sde): yul myin la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba chos kyi sku ni rab bye skra mnyam yang / gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad/ sems cad rnam la phan pa'i thug rje rabaskyed nas/ bsod nas
247a3(mdo sde): ban+de ba'i mtshan ge spu'i mchog kyang ston/ khyod ni myi gsung sa sring smra dang tshig kyang myed/ tshig gi rang bzhin brag tsha'i mtshan nyid gzung du myed/ smre myed cig myed yi ge myed pa mabyin nis kyang khyimam pa khyed ni
247a4(mdo sde): snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung / sem can ku kyi sem dang / sem byung rjes su rig/ khyod ni sem gyi rang zhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen/ sem rgyud kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra rab mkhyen kyang / sem dang
247a5(mdo sde): yid rnam la ni khyed kyi sem myi gnas/ 'gro ba rnam la khyod kyis byed pa kun ston te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'byung ba yongs ma mchis// gang gi gzug dang sem dang yon tan cid par mtshan
247a6(mdo sde): dang spyod lam dag kyang de'i tshul tu ston/ bde ga reg gi chos 'di la ni nga'ir 'dzin pa myed/ sem can mang po kun rtag chos kyi 'dul mabyin nas/ khyod ni bya na myed pa'i chos rnam rtag tu ston// rgyal ba
247a7(mdo sde): sul 'khor 'di kun gyis ltos par/ gzug dang mtshanas tha dad skal pa mi mnyam gnas/ khyod kyi su ni myi 'byur rtog sred mtshan byed de/ 'khor nam ji lta ba'i sems dang bas ma bani rtsom 'ar mdza
247a8(mdo sde): cha'adi mas ca tu can las skyed pa te/ khyod byed pa pa nyid myed kun tu chog las skyes// bde gcig de 'dra'i chos kyi sa rnams mkhyed nas su byang chub kyi 'gyur ni ba bcud med pa sa
247a9(mdo sde): mtha' dang de bzhin dalus 'bang rnam par rtog pa med// slong zhing gsong la rang bzhin gsob ste laman/ khyod kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam par khyen nas su/ 'gro ba rnamal
247b1(mdo sde): rgyu dang las byed pa ston pa chos 'di sems can med cing sreg dang gang zag men/ na mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas na ming yang rnam par dag/ sems can gan du nyan zhes
247b2(mdo sde): yang dag bdag med pa// mi 'chi 'dus ma byas sems can mang sa da mdzad// btson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis byang chuba'i ngo tshol phyir// khyod kyis skal ba bsam yas bye ba phyeg rgyar skyob/
247b3(mdo sde): sgrub pa med pa'i nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub te gang phyir spyad pa'i don re rjes su thob par gyur// chos rnams mnyam pa nying ni marnam par bzhag mkhyen pas// rab dang 'brin dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par
247b4(mdo sde): mkhyen / mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid rtag zhugs rnam mi rtog de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par gzhag cing mi 'gyur ba// phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma zhin/ 'jig rten gsum po chu zla
247b5(mdo sde): 'dra ste// 'pho ba med sems can rnams ni rma lam lta bur dngos med de// mkhyen pasarmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsungs// byang chub mchog rab rnga'i rang bzhin
247b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi rnyes// de ni thos dang ma thob pazhis rjod du med// ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang // tshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan dang bral bas
247b7(mdo sde): rab tu skor// rgal nas sems can mang po bsam yang rab grol ba// grol nas bcings pa'i nang na bcings pa shin tu grol// theg chen blo med 'di la 'gro ba
247b8(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin cing // nges 'byin mnyam brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la bgod/ gang na yang sems can nam yang mya nga ni 'das ma mchis// sems can gdod nas
247b9(mdo sde): rnams ngag sems can nyid mi sgrub// sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ 'di'i mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad/ na mkha' la ni gzugs rnam nam yang
249a1(mdo sde): de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la su/ bdag la bdag med shin kunam dag yid// sems can don grags sems can med la dga'// sems can bdag med nanas las par
249a2(mdo sde): byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'dri'o// co ga spyod pa rtul zhugs yongasu dag/ bsam pa dag kyang sems ni na mkha' 'dra/ lhun po lta bur brtan zhing mi g.yo ba/ de dag ched du yon tan mdzad la nu// mi
249a3(mdo sde): zlog rten pa brtson 'grus kun las bzang // dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra'i nga rgyal bcom// nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri sbyong ba/ mthong dga' de dag don tu 'di zhu'o// thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus
249a4(mdo sde): dga'// bsam gtan rnam thar shes rab mchog tu gyur// mngon shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od// rab dga' dri med don tu bdag zhu'o// stong pa mtshan ma med cing mi smon gnas// bsams bzhin
249a5(mdo sde): shi 'pho dang ni skye ba ston/ skyes pa med cing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med// de dag don tu mi'i spyod pa zhu// nyan thos rang rgyal skyes gzhan dag gis// rtogs par dga' zhing zab mo mthong dga' ba/
249a6(mdo sde): skye bo kun gyi yid rnams skul ba yi// chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs la zhu// legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'// chos la chos med 'dzin pa gnyis las grol// rtag tu mnyam banas
249a7(mdo sde): mchog gi chos dga'/ sems kyang na mkha' tshungs pa'i don du zhu// gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'// rtag tu sangs rgyas stong pa kun med blo// grags pa mtha' las 'jig rten
249a8(mdo sde): gsum du thos// yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub
249b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag sbyin pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags tshul khrims na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam/
249b2(mdo sde): gtan na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang // ye shes na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis snang ba'i sangs
249b3(mdo sde): rgyas rjes dran pa dang / chos rjes dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjesu dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjesu dran
249b4(mdo sde): ba dang mi 'bral ba lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod do// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shwe pa rnas lags/ sang+yas
249b5(mdo sde): bco ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad
249b6(mdo sde): yongasu 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bgyid pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i slad du tshul bzhin du 'ang rab
249b7(mdo sde): tu sbyor ba rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing thams cad la bgyid pa lpags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par bgyi'i chos kyi tshul zab so la zhugs pa rnams
249b8(mdo sde): lags/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i shes pa la mkhas paste/ mtha' gnyis su la ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ de bzhin ga bye ba'i phyag rgya btab pas de bzhin nyid dang med pa pa sa
249b9(mdo sde): bgra chos kyi dbyings kyi nus la rab tu 'u bra shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lags/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la leg par bad sa shing mi g.yo ba rnams pam/ sangs
250a1(mdo sde): @#// rgyas kyi u bo bcing / rang gyi yul yong su dag pa rnam/ lagrwa gzung thob pa rtag tu mi brjod par spyod pa rnam lags/ tho pa ngog pa med ci rgyan mi lad la/ rtag tu sa rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs pa rnams lags/
250a2(mdo sde): skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnam la dbang thob pa rnams lags/ bdud bzhi'i lus yang dag par 'das shing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcwa cad bcom pa rnam lags/ bsod nam kyi nos tshad med pa sngags shing
250a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba lags// sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sang rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnamA la nye bar gnas pa rnam lagA/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin pob cing sem can bam cad kyi skyod
250a4(mdo sde): ba la mi nasA pa rnam lagA/ chabA pa bamA cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / na mkha' la rlung mar lta bu'i sem+ba dang ldan pa rnam lag/ chos dang spyad pa'i tshul shes pa dang / mun ma dang bral zhing snang 'thob pa rnam pa
250a5(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang 'byung gyi ye she shin tu rtog pa rnaMs lag/ myur du theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di 'thob par 'gyur lag/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub
250a6(mdo sde): sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnamakhar mdzod la 'di skad ces bkra stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod leg so leg so// skyes bu dam pa khyed bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri bar ses pa legs so// 'di lta ste khyod ni ses can pas
250a7(mdo sde): cad kyis gsol ba ma btang pa'i shes nyen sang rgyas kyi chos bdi la snangs pa thob pa byab pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go cha 'gos pa/ bgrang ba las 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas la spen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos tshol ba
250a8(mdo sde): mi pra pa/ ye shes kyi mtshon ma can nga rgyal gyi rnam mas cad pa yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sem can gyi don la rtson pa 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad lnga yang dag par 'das pa na mkha' dang ma rung
250b1(mdo sde): pa'i ses kyi bam dadang mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnam kyi mtha' rtog par sla ba ma yin// de'i phyir rig kyi bu khyod leg par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /
250b2(mdo sde): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnam yon tan 'di rnam dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba bad do// bcoM ldan 'dra legaso zhes gsol nas byang chub sem dpa' namakha' mdzod/ bco ldan
250b3(mdo sde): 'dra kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bco ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sem dpa' sbyin pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag
250b4(mdo sde): rnas par dag pa ra ras r+the/ sem+ba can dam+b+ha pA dag pA sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa sa/ sbyin pa rnam par dag pa/ sngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dag/ bsngo rnam par dag pa byang chub rnam par dag pa la 'jug
250b5(mdo sde): ste/ rig kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan ge byang chub sem+ba dpa' sbyin pa na mkha' dang mchud pa yin// des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo rnas sbyin pa de sbyin te/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag
250b6(mdo sde): par sbyin pa de sdin rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba
250b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag par sbyin pa de spyir/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyi no// ji ltar na mkhar mthar med pa bzhi/
250b8(mdo sde): du ses mapar med par byas te sbyid pa de sbyin ji ltar namakhar rgya chen zhing sgring pa med pa de bzhin du sngos te sbyin pa de sbyin ji ltar na mkha' la gzug med pa de bzhin du gzug bas cad la mi gnas par smin
251a1(mdo sde): / ba de sbyin/ ji ltar nam kha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba bas cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji skar na mkha' la 'du shes pa de bzhin du 'du shes tham cad kyi mdun pa med pa sbyin pa de sbyin/
251a2(mdo sde): ji ltar na mkhar 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du/ 'dus byas thams cad med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar na mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin ji ltar na mkha' sangs
251a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tham cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can tham cad la byams pa khyab par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar na mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gi rig mi zad par sngo zhing sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar na mkha' mu med pa de bzhin
251a4(mdo sde): dadu nyon mongs pa bam cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar na mkhar rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sem can gyi rang bzhin yongasu dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar na mkha' semra can tham cad kyi skab 'byed pa de bzhin du sem
251a5(mdo sde): can bcwa cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar na mkha' la di'i' ba med pa de bzhin du sems can thos cad yid la byed pa thams cad me dang bral ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de sbyin pa lta bur
251a6(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub ste/ sems can dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing / chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang
251a7(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rig kyi bu gang de skar bur sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba de ni/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dod zhing thams cad kyi re she/
251a8(mdo sde): kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur gtong ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin nod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na mar/
251b1(mdo sde): me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sbyin pa yong su gtong ba 'di 'dra lags bcom ldan/
251b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam par med pa ste/ rnam par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pas chos rnam par dag/
251b3(mdo sde): pa ste/ chos rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems kyi rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten
251b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa gzugs med pa gzugs rtsod pa gzugs mod pa gzugasu ston pa dang / mi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig lnga
251b5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa mthar phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa lung bstan pa thob pa/ mtshams gcad cing byang chub sems dpa'
251b6(mdo sde): nges par gyur pa la zhug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing / dbang sgyur thob pa sangs rgyas kyi rnas thapA cad la yang dag par zhugs shi mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sbyor ba legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/
251b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul/ skyes bu dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// bstan 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems
251b8(mdo sde): dpa' khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la bzod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyid
252a1(mdo sde): sbyin byang chub phyir te rnams sprin yongs mi 'dod/ dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med do// rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin// mkhas pas chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas
252a2(mdo sde): su// lus dang srog la 'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing de dag la ni nams kyang 'dzin pa ming// de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges// thams cad btang yang mi dga' mi 'gyur zhing // de la zhum pa med
252a3(mdo sde): re gong ba med// de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa'ang med// bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas nas rnam par dag/ byang chub rnam par dag pas
252a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin// de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par// spros pa med par sgrim pa rab tu sbyin// sems mnyam yid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtong // rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med
252a5(mdo sde): par sbyin bsam pa yongs dag dri ma med pa yis// thams cad gtong yang rnam par smin mi 'dong // lus dang tshe ni mya rtag sgyu ma 'dra// longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin snying po med//
252a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten ku ma la snying ce skyed nas// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos sbyin pa sbyin// nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtod // rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste bdud rnams
252a7(mdo sde): kyis kyang bdag la grags me rnyed// da ltar rtags na thams cad gtod byayi// stobs bcus sbyin partsa ba yi sa shes gsungs// de la rab tu gnas nas tshul khrims ldan// tshul ni/
252a8(mdo sde): yon tan gnas na sa bams gtan rnyed// bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim// nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir/
252a9(mdo sde): me skye// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la ngan par gsungs// ban dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas 'gru// sbyin gtong 'om mongs srang zhing dge ba'i phyir// des na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi gyur/
252b1(mdo sde): pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste gas bang gzon pa dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo // ji lta ji ltar mthum sems kyis gtong // de lta des ni byang byang yon tan mthong / ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong /
252b2(mdo sde): de lta de ltar sems can rgya tsho byed/ de nas bcoM ldan 'das byung chub sem dpar sa dpa' chen po na mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu cos bzhi dang ldanan byang chub sem dpa' sos dang chen po nul grim mamapa' dang mtshungs
252b3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gdug rten lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sem mnyam pa nyid dang / na mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ rig kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan/
252b4(mdo sde): byang chub sem dpa' tshul khrims na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// ris kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sem dpa' rnam kyi tshul khrim yong su dgapa ste/ brgyad gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sem can na par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sem dang mi rmel
252b5(mdo sde): ba dang / chad mar gyur bar gyur pa rnaM par dag pa'i phyir nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sem med pa dang dam bcas pa na par dag pa'i phyir slab pa thams cad 'dor ba dang / sgor lam yongasu dag pa'i phyir skye ba thang du mi 'jug pa dang /
252b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i yong su dag pa'i phyir mi lhod pa dang / mtshan ma yongasu dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu sngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa yong su dag pa'i phyir kun nas bdud ba med pa dang / byang chung yong su dag pa'i phyir sngon 'am med su rjod pa ste
252b7(mdo sde): ni kyi bu rgyad po de da ba ni nga nub sem dang rnas kyi chung drim yongasu dag pa'o// can yang nul dri sa yong sa dab pa ni nam pa 'dabang ste/ chug dris de yang dag pa'o// ma 'drim med pa ste/ chub drin de yang dri ma med pa'o// ma pa' shing ste/ tsub
252b8(mdo sde): khrims de ying zhinga'o// na mkha' mi mtho ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang mi mtho ba'o// nam mkha' mi dma' ba ste/ tshul khrim+ba de yang mi dma' ba'o// namakha' zung du med pa ste/ tshul khrim de yang bzung du med pa'o//
253a1(mdo sde): @#/ hAganam pa gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang gnas med pa'o namakha' med ma yin te/ rdul khrim de la med pa ma yin pa'o/ nam kha' rtag pa skye/ tshul khrims de yang rta ga /
253a2(mdo sde): namakha' mi zad ba ste tshul khrims de yang mi zad pa'o// nam mkha' mkhan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang mtshan ma myed pa'o// mkha' chu ba med pa ste/ tshul khrim de yang rgyu ba med pa'o// na mkha'
253a3(mdo sde): bya smos pa med pa bre/ chul khris de yang spros pa med pa la na mkha' zag pa med pa ste/ tshul khrim du yang zag pa med pa'o// nam par 'dus sargyas pa ste/ tshul 'im de 'dus ma byas pa'o// dag par gyi gra rtse
253a4(mdo sde): tshul khrim de yang mi 'gyur ba'o// na mkha' rnams par pi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rnam pa mi rtog pa'o// ngamakha' thaMd du song ba ste/ tshul khrim de yang thaMd du song ba'o// namakha' mi chod mi phyed pa ste/
253a5(mdo sde): tshul khrim de yang mi chod mi byed pa'o// namakha' mtshungs par skyong ba ste/ tshul khrim de yang mtshungs par sbyong ba'o// mkha' rang bzhin gyis cam nyon mong pa cam ma yin pa ste/ tshul de yang rang bzhin g+hi ca
253a6(mdo sde): sa can mod pa cad ma yis pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar gan pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' tshul khrim na mkha' dang mardungs pa yi'o// de nas bac+doMs kyi da'i tshe tshig bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// semasa'i tshul khrim
253a7(mdo sde): dri med srung zhing gdung ba med/ lus dang sos kyang rnam dag ngag yid 'di snga mas/ mkhra pa rtag tu nang zhi tshul khram dreg mi sAm+ba// blo chung sos la mi gnas byang chub sos la ton/ lnga gang ma byas pa
253a8(mdo sde): bas de bzhim ma rtags te/ de ni dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzug yi gnas/ gzung med mi g.yo bden pa na mkha' bzhis tshul khrim lba ba'i gnas med mkhra pa kun gyi sngags// tshul khrims de ni
253b1(mdo sde): rab zhi'i byed nyon mongs ni/ zhi gnas lhag mthong dgi mthar byin mapar ston pa/ gang su bcing las grol ba de dag tshul khrim par byed byang chub rtsa ba'i ba'i// gag su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod
253b2(mdo sde): nyung chog shes pa/ yo byad sbyangs shing bsaM gtan dber tshogs sos sbyangs pa/ tshul khrim de'i gnas des sems rgad thar pa'i rten/ de phyir tshul khrims rgyan pa lam bde tha~Md bsgrub/ g.yo ba rlom seMs kun
253b3(mdo sde): bral lta ba'i nyon modra bcod// na mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin spyod/ byang chub phyir nges mi gtong byang chub kun pi rtogs// gang mkhas chos shes de 'dra/
253b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims pha rol phyin 'phags pa na mkha'i mdzod kyi zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// baM bo gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sem dpa' bzod pa na mkha' dad pan
253b5(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ ribA kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa byang chub seMs dpa' na mkha' dang 'tshungs yin te bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshig ni mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang /
253b6(mdo sde): yus ni mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir rdebs kyang slar mi brdegs pa dang / sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir skyos kyang sngar mi spyod pa dang / bsam pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir
253b7(mdo sde): khras kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa namakha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
253b8(mdo sde): bzod pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag ni brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhen 'di ste/ nam khar la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems cad thaMd la zhes 'bras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs dag pa dang /
254a1(mdo sde): @#/ nam mkha' la rjesu chags pa med de/ rnyes pa dang bkur sI la rjes chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongasu dag pa dang / naM na mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sos can thaMd la sem mnyam
254a2(mdo sde): ba'i bzod pa yongasu dag pa dang / namakha' ni ma snang ma nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad par nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongasu dag pa dang / ni mkha' na bag la nyal thams cad spadra ba
254a3(mdo sde): ste/ bag la nyal ba med pa'i bzod pa yongasu dag pa dang / na mkha' ni yid dang dmyigs pa med ste/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i bzod pa yongasu dag dang / na mkha' ni ma skyes pa ma byung ba ste/
254a4(mdo sde): ma skyes pa byung ba'i bzod pa can gyi bzod pa yongasu dag pa dang / na mkha' ni gzugs dang gzug med pa thams cad la byam pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad pa
254a5(mdo sde): de dag ni byang chub seMs sos dpa' rnams bzod pa yong su dag pa na mkha' dang rigs kyi bu bya ba sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa 'di rgyad de ni brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
254a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba bzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba med la la bzod kyang skye ba dang / smon pa med pa la bzod kyang byung
254a7(mdo sde): tu smon pa mngam yin pa dang / mngon par 'dra mi byed pa la bzod pa la bzod kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba med pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma pa dang /
254a8(mdo sde): zung ba med tha la brjod kyang skye ba dang gnas lam 'di ba dang / sems skyed pa ma bzang kyang dngam khornam gcig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin bzod kyang dus rngam par gcig pa'i phyir
254a9(mdo sde): ma yin pa ste rig kyi bu brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub sos dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pam/ bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag bdag la she yang bzod pa snyam pa de ni nga'i
254b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di mi na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yid// 'di dag gshe ba bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni ngar 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni dam kha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod
254b2(mdo sde): ma yin no// 'di dag ni yi ge ba snong ba'i snyam pa de ni sma dang skad kyi bzod pa// de ni nam mkhas dang mtshungs pa mthong pa ma yin// 'di yang stong pa bdag kyang srong po snyam pa de ni/ yid la byed pa sbyor pa'i
254b3(mdo sde): bzod pa ste/ de ni ni mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin// bdag gis bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i 'azod pa ba ste/ de ni mamakha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma mim// 'di lta ste dper na
254b4(mdo sde): / khye pa sa ya dan pa sa su de ya 'das yang de ma na
254b5(mdo sde): rternam pa yang med/ khang khrol yang med de mi rtog rnam yang mi/ rtog yongasu mi dog pa de bzhin du gang bzod pa ni/ byA bi sems dpa'i bzod pa rnam dang mtshungs pa'i mtshogs go// de nas bac+doMs kyi
254b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad btang / yid ni yul la ma chags shin tu snyoms/ phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa/ na mkha' mtshungs ma'am
254b7(mdo sde): sems mchog bzod pa'o// lus 'di gzugs rnyan rtsa shing rtsig pa 'dra sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra/ chos 'di lta ba'i gnas med mkha' bzhi ma lus kyang mi 'gyur yid
254b8(mdo sde): la khro ba med bkur sti byed la dga' dang zhe sdang med/ mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog pa med/ theg pa 'ga' 'dras ltar sbyor ba de/ sems can dag pa rtan 'dang bzod
254b9(mdo sde): sgra yin// srog med gang zas bdag med sems can med/ chos 'di tha~Md stong par gang bzod cing / rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed/ de ni sman 'dir 'thong mchog yang
255a1(mdo sde): dag nyid/ kha ngan zer ba'i tshig thos mi gshe zhing // byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin// bdag rnam gsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de/
255a2(mdo sde): bstan 'dir sems can gtsang ma bzod smra yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang
255a3(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkhar dang tshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom yang / chos thams
255a4(mdo sde): cad yongs su ma grub par rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang
255a5(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs
255a6(mdo sde): su 'dzin kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de gla dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
255a7(mdo sde): 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus gang
255a8(mdo sde): gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur rig pas mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshib de ya ma rAr rnaM par rtags te/
255b1(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par rtags te/ mi dmigs pa dang /
255b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu snga bar byed kyang / de gcig nas gcig du sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags na dmigs pa dang //
255b3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub phyogs thams cad yang dag par sgrubs kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags te/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang
255b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod par bde ba'i zhing de yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas nom par brtags te/ mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus
255b5(mdo sde): nga gis thos pa thams cad 'dzin par byed de de yang sgra brag cha dang 'tshungs pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
255b6(mdo sde): cad rab tu grub pa de yang chos kyi dbyings dper med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par rtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
255b7(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhi na 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson
255b8(mdo sde): 'grus dang / yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so// de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni lus dang sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o// yongs su chad blo/ brtson 'grus ni len pa med/
256a1(mdo sde): pa 'dor ba med pa gnas pa med pa ste/ nam byang chub sems dpa' lus dang gang dang sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas par shin tu
256a2(mdo sde): rtags nas mi dmigs shing / yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkhar dang mtshungs
256a3(mdo sde): pa yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs su med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang chos thams cad la mi gnas/
256a4(mdo sde): shing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed de ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson
256a5(mdo sde): 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// ji ltar nam mkha' las rtsa dang nags tshal dang lo tog skye yang rtsa ba med cing gnas
256a6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtson 'grus de yang sangs rgyas kyi thams cad skyed kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do// ji ltar nam mkhara' thams cad
256a7(mdo sde): du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus de yang sme ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang blo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ ji ltar nam
256a8(mdo sde): mkha' mtshungs par sbyor shing gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang rnams cud dang chos thams cad mtshungs par
256b1(mdo sde): spor zhing sprod pa rna tshogs kun tu ston to// / nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid par/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing
256b2(mdo sde): gang la rtsom pa de yang rnam par rtags nas mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkhar dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
256b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// brtson 'grus dag gis stobs kyi mthu bskyed nas/ lus dang srog la 'da'aphang par mi byed cing / bdag nyid chen po byang
256b4(mdo sde): chub spang pa spong / sems can phan pa'i don byed sems pa'i/ sngon gyi srid par 'dus byad ji srid pa/ byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor/ de dag sgo 'gyur ba'ang
256b5(mdo sde): yod med do/ phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed/ sems can bam mi khyab pa 'gro bar brtson/ sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa mchod par rtson/ zhing rnams bsam mi khyab
256b6(mdo sde): palta bar rtsen/ bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar rtson/ sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar rtson/ tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab bsrung ba brtson bzod
256b7(mdo sde): pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson/ bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab sems par brtson/ shes rab bsam gyis mi
256b8(mdo sde): khyab bsgom par brtson/ byams pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ don dang yon tan sgrub par rab tu brtson/ srog dang lus kyang mi pangs rtson par byed
257a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs 'bab pa kun las rnam par thob/ stong pa rnam par bdag med mngon par brtson bdag la bdag med rtse nan
257a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid brtson/ g+ha las rnam gros byang chub phyir yang spyod/ sgyu ma smig rgyu'i nga ba nyid du brtson// sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa zan/
257a3(mdo sde): g.yo ba'i chos rnams ston par ston/ 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par gros/ bshad cing klog pa la ni rtag tu brtson/ chos dang chos man
257a4(mdo sde): gnyis las shin du 'das/ sgra dang pi ke'i ngob nyid la brtson/ 'gro ba rnams la mdo sde'i stong rnamas+tha/ sangs rgyas yon tan rnams
257a5(mdo sde): nimatha' yas med/ sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mtha' med de/ mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus sbyar sems can spyad baman
257a6(mdo sde): med ma / la 'dus man ma / sa pa da / @
257a7(mdo sde): pa di 'a ba ma du du/ du chu[।] na
257a8(mdo sde): nga du sa/
257b1(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang dag par 'jog la nang du sems gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /
257b2(mdo sde): sems phyi rol nas kyang zlog la phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba yang mi dmigs pa dang / bdag gi sems

257b8(mdo sde): gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te// bsam gtan
258a1(mdo sde): @#mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /
258a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed
258a3(mdo sde): kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs
258a4(mdo sde): med pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bas gtan yong su dag pa'o// gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i
258a5(mdo sde): sems ni bsam gtan yong su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtogs pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la srid mi mtho mi dma' mi stod mi smod pa/ 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par mi rtog
258a6(mdo sde): pa/ sgrogs pa med pa/ 'bri ba med pa/ 'dzin pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa yid la byed pa med pa men/ gcig la'ang
258a7(mdo sde): ma yin/ gnyis la'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ spros pa med pa dang / spogs pa med pa/ sgom pa med pa/ 'jig pa med pa ste/
258a8(mdo sde): gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// gang sems mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtog pa ni gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/
258b1(mdo sde): mig dang gzugs rnam par shes pa rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems can par rtogs pa ni sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ rna ba dang sgra rnam par shes pa rig
258b2(mdo sde): cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ sna dang dri rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsaM
258b3(mdo sde): gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lce dang ro rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byedado// sems nges par rtog pa ni reg
258b4(mdo sde): ba rnags la mi rgyug ste/ lus la reg pa dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ yid
258b5(mdo sde): dad chos dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// dper na bskal pas sreg pa na mkha' mi 'tshig cing chus 'jig pa na na mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur
258b6(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshig cing bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom par
258b7(mdo sde): thams cad la'ang ma chags pa yin no// mnyam par bzhag pa yang yin la sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu dgod do// mnyam par bzhag pa na yang dga' ba med
258b8(mdo sde): la langs nas kyang 'ong khro ba med pa yin no// 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams la zhi ba nye bar stong kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye'o rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir// brtson 'grus rab tu 'ang
258b9(mdo sde): kyi bu 'dzilta
259a1(mdo sde): bar byed do// mnyam par bzhag cing mnyam pa yang yin la/ mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa yang rab tu ston to// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa yang
259a2(mdo sde): mi mthong / mi mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do// de ni mi 'gal zhing 'gal ba med pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// shes rab che ba'i/
259a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan namakha
259a4(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yi no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// bsam gtan rnams kyi dbang po yongasu dag/ dran pa rtse gcig
259a5(mdo sde): yid ni mnyam par bzhag/ gnas rnams thams cad la yang mi gnas shing / 'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi// phung po skye mched khams la mi gan+da
259a6(mdo sde): pa mi// phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing / nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te/ mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa yi yid/ shin tu
259a7(mdo sde): dben pa'i sems kyang ston cing / mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chags so// 'gro ba rnams kyang longasu smin pa'i phyir// 'chi 'pho skye ba 'chi ba nye ston kyang / ting nge 'dzin las de dag
259a8(mdo sde): mi nyams te/ de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o// gzugs med ting 'dzin kyang spyod yul la/ sems can rnams ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i kham su 'ang rab tu snang byed de/
259b1(mdo sde): de dag bdag dang sems can mi gnas so// na mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te/ sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs zhing smig rgyu 'dra/ rmi lam chu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du chos rnams shes nas rtag
259b2(mdo sde): tu mnyam par bzhag/ 'gro ba kun gyi sems kyi spyod yul du/ 'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing / sems rgyud la ni sgribs pa med pa ste/ rang gi sems rgyud kyi kyang rab tu
