284a5(mdo sde): byas la min// 'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba// de sems dpa'i rdzi ba med pa yin/ pha rol tshu rol gang la yang mi chags la// chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing /
284a6(mdo sde): sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med// mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de// srid pa gsum pa 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang // stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab
284a7(mdo sde): shes shing / lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems sgrol// de na ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa/ 'dzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul min mkhas// chos rnams gdod nas stong par
284a8(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dud// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya// sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur// sems ni sems
284b1(mdo sde): la gnas kyang mtshams mi sgrog 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang nu zla ltar/
284b2(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces// nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa/ sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa/ gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos
284b3(mdo sde): rnams kun// sgyu ma mig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang // gsog dang rdzun dang rtag pa med par shes/ de ni byang chub snying por myur du 'gro/ chos gtan la 'bebs pa 'di
284b4(mdo sde): bshad pa na ste dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag 'dun bcu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
284b5(mdo sde): chub tu sems skyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyi stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa tho' gyur te/ stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten khyams 'di yang
284b6(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// lha ban+d+ha stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan
284b7(mdo sde): dag kyang de krol nas 'di skad ces gang dag snyan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs kyi yul du rjes su dang
284b8(mdo sde): yin no// gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis legs rgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o// de cir/
285a1(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang
285a2(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ro// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung snyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'
285a3(mdo sde): mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs gang ba ri ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol
285a4(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes na chags pa mi mnga' ba/ snyan pa 'di ni rgyun mi 'chad pa de bzhin ga bye
285a5(mdo sde): pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcos kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam
285a6(mdo sde): par snyan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'di yang rgyas par rjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang
285a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di dag la yang chos kyi snang ba chen po rgyas par mdzad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i ston pas
285a8(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo chang ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o// 'phag pa nas pa' mdzad kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bzhi po ma
285b1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa myur bar grob pa zhes bya ba de gas na nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dus pa dag byang chub sems dpa' namapa' gadzang sa na
285b2(mdo sde): ces smra so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming na mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam// smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ na mkha' ni kho bo'i midzod do// myur bar spos pa
285b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu na mkha'i mdzod kyi bre brag bdag cag gis kyang lta'o// de nas bac+doMs kyis byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis na mkha'
285b4(mdo sde): mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sem dpa' myur bar spob pa la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod yid la gag 'dod pa
285b5(mdo sde): de kho bos na ma ka la char dbab po// de nas byang chub sem dpa' myur bar spob pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gsheg pa rin po che ut+pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khas
285b6(mdo sde): pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i rgyar ni rgyang grag kyi tshad ni 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa gos ka tsa
285b7(mdo sde): lin di ka ltar re ga na bde ba/ dris ni sa ng+yas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po rgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa pad+ma de mthong ba dang / dri rnams pas
285b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de dag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char po bshig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyar
286a1(mdo sde): par spob pas bsams ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ na mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon
286a2(mdo sde): par bab ste de na 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri chor yang / mthong bas dbang ba'i zas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs so// 'khor de dag thaMd tingange 'dzin las
286a3(mdo sde): langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam ka mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas 'di snyed ces 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs legs so la gso//
286a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rin can bkod ces bya ba 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa'
286a5(mdo sde): nam ka mdzod la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis na mkha' las gser phyi'i char pho ba shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyi tshig de skad slas ma thag tu de'i mod la nam
286a6(mdo sde): mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par bab po// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
286a7(mdo sde): kyis namakha las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob shig/ tshig 'di skad smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod la phyogs bcu na ji tsam rin po che grangs med dgag tu med ming tha dad pa de dag gi cher chen
286a8(mdo sde): / mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bye dur+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dbar po dang / sdug dang dpal gyi snying zla ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen
286b1(mdo sde): bai dUr+ya dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / mi shes dang / snang byed dang / nga mchog dang / lam gleng dru/ ma 'od dang / dung dang / ma shes dang / byi ru dang / san kyis dang / yod
286b2(mdo sde): 'byung gnas dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu 'dog dang / chu dang / rab byed dang // sa'i 'od dang / mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig mi bzang ba dang / rgyu drin rdzogs
286b3(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can dang / 'jig rten snang ba dang / skar ma'i sgra dang /
286b4(mdo sde): do'adzin dang / zla gam dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo dang / 'dzam bu gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mi'i 'od dang / me'i 'od dang / rgyal bas rgyan pa dang / tshab
286b5(mdo sde): zhi byed dang / gdung ba med pa dang / nad sel dang / mig spong dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sbyong ba dang / yan lag du mar snang ba
286b6(mdo sde): dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po dang / 'od sor po dang / kar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dro ba rin po che thams cad yang dag par
286b7(mdo sde): 'dus dang / ming de lta bus dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming skal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no//
286b8(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' rnamakha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig /
286'a1(mdo sde): su la ma dus 'ad sgru sgyus
286'a2(mdo sde): gi sgras log pa mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / khrag dang rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu sems can de/ skyab pa'i phyir dang skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis pog shig/ de nas de ma thag tu
286'a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bza ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / ldag pa sna tshogs char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang / btung ba
286'a4(mdo sde): thas cad kyi char mngon par bab po// gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog pa dad pa dang / kha dog rgya stong du ma dang / phra zhing 'dzem pa ka tsa la ni di ka ltar reg na bdi ba'i char rab tu bab te/ de rma
286'a5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas na bkren pa dang / dbul po bsad dang / yi dgas thos cad kun tshim par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes
286'a6(mdo sde): bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' namakha mdzod la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med pa nang du bas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du sman chen po'i char
286'a7(mdo sde): gag gis na de dag thams cad nad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ba phob shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des
286'a8(mdo sde): nang thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song srong zhes bya ba des/ chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la/
286'b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las 'od rang gtang ste/ sem
286'b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / shin rjes 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu
286'b3(mdo sde): ldan par gyur te/ ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i rab du med tog
286'b4(mdo sde): dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la stsogs pa rol mo snga
286'b5(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang slas dang / rta dang / ba blang ba dang /
286'b6(mdo sde): shing rta dang / dpung chung dang / gzhon pa dang / khyim dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang /
286'b7(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pha brang 'khor dang / skyed mos tshal dang / yang thog dang / khad+ma legs pa dang /
286''a1(mdo sde): @/ dang sten bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sem+ba ra DI 'di dag chos/
286''a2(mdo sde): kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di 'ang / rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub semA dpa' tshangs kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yod ga rung 'i phyir nga'i shA du 'ong ngo // de na byang chub
286''a3(mdo sde): sa can ma das mam kha sa sa rdzu mams na rgya sa
286''a4(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa sang rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha pA de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig cig 'byung ba tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rte
286''a5(mdo sde): gi kham+ba 'di phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang gdug dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba char rab tu phra ba
286''a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin tu brjes pi zla ba dang / zhi mi 'od dang / nyi sa rab tu 'bar ba dang / me shel dang / mdog mdze chen po dang / mdog marje bar 'jug pa dang / sba la dang / sbal chen po dang /
286''a7(mdo sde): ska la rab mdzes dbum med dang / kun tu dri ma med pa dang / rna pA 'od dang / gser du snang dang / nam kha'i snang dang / reb gyur dang / dri chen dkar dang / mda' brgyad dang / ze ba stong ldan dang / mya ngan sel pa dang / dga'
286''a8(mdo sde): byed dang / was spong ba dang / kU'i me tog dang / dga' ba kur skyed pa dang / bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris na dang / lus sems tshim byed dang / stong gsum dri dang / nad kun zhi byed dang / nad kun sel dang / bdag gi gci rje
286''b1(mdo sde): / kyis brgyan cing dpag tu med ldi bsod nas kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub semadapa reg pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong bsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi Shamra 'di kun du byebs par byas pas kyi
286''b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil khor tham cad du me tog gis pus so nub tsam du gyur to// de na mam cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nges sngon ma bos ma mthong rje me tog mthong nas/ bcoM ldan 'ad la 'di skad ces gsol
286''b3(mdo sde): bco ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog lta na sdug pa 'di dag ga las mchis/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa semA dpa chen po na mkha'i mdzob de/ bkod pa chen po
286''b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'o te/ de ni mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang lhan cig tu na pa pa'i dkyil
286''b5(mdo sde): nas paT te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsuM skor ba byas te/ btsa ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gabye ba rin po chen po'i dkod pa gcig pa ni/ bcoM ldan 'das la gnod pa rung
286''b6(mdo sde): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po na mkha' mdzod la stsogs pa/ byang chub seMs dpa'i bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa/
286''b7(mdo sde): chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing // chos chen po dang ldan nas/ slar ldog pa 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ga mchid kyi/ bco ldan 'das kyi mgu par mdzod cig ces de skad ces kyang
286''b8(mdo sde): gsung // de nas byang chub sos dpa'i namakha'i mdzod kyi bco ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdug byin gri ru bA nas bco ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas ci ga su bcad pa rigs man pA ltang
286'''a1(mdo sde): / pa chos dang don dang yon tan dang / yon tan 'phags pas na/ yongs dag rnam dag ldanas dag cing dri ma med/ gnas med na mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yorab tu rnyes/ rab pab kunas skyong/
286'''a2(mdo sde): yul mi la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal bcos kyi sku ni rab phye sku mnyam yang / gzug mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzangs sku yang ston par mdzad/ seMs can rnams la phan pa'i rje rab skyed nas// bsod nam brgya pa'i ma
286'''a3(mdo sde): gi sku'i mchog kyang ston// khyod ni mig gsungs rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med// cig gi rang bzhin brag cha'i mtshan nyid gzung du med// sgra med rtag med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang / byams pa khyod na
286'''a4(mdo sde): snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung / seMs can kun gyi sems dang sems byung rjes rig/ khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen/ sems rgyud kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra bar mkhyen kyang / sems
286'''a5(mdo sde): dang yid rnams la ni khyed kyi sems mi gnas/ 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis byed pa kun ston te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i ku ni 'gyur ba yongs ma mchis/ gang gi gzugs dang sems dang yon tan
286'''a6(mdo sde): ci 'dra bar/ mtsham dang spyod lam dag kyang de'i tshul du ston/ bder gshegs chos la ni nga'ir 'dzin pa med/ khyod ni chos la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med/ sem can mang po kun tog chos kyi 'dul
286'''a7(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/ khyod ni bya na med pa'i chos rnam rtag tu ston// rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kun gyis bzlas pa na/ gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dang skal ba mi mnyam gnas/ khyod kyi sku ni rtog med
286'''a8(mdo sde): mtshan med de/ 'khor rjes de lta ba'i seMs dang bsaM zhi tshim par mdzad/ chos 'di tha~Md rgyu dang rkyen las skyed pa ste/ khyod med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las skyes// bde gshegs 'dra'i chos kyi
286'''b1(mdo sde): tshul rnams mkhyen nas su/ byang chub mi 'gyur gi 'di bla na med pa rnyes/ mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med/ stong zhing gsog la rang bzhin gsob ste ya sarba/ khyod kyi de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam
286'''b2(mdo sde): bar mkhyenas/ 'gro ba rnal chu dang lnga byed pa ston// chos 'di sos can med cing srog dang gang zag med// nas pa' tshungs mnyam pas na ming yang rnam par dag/ sems can gan du nyen gshes yang dag
286'''b3(mdo sde): bdag med pa/ mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sa mdzad/ brtson 'grus mthu dang stod kyis byang chub 'tshol phyir/ khyod kyi skal pa bas yas bye ba phrag rgyar spyod/ sgrub pa med bI nan tan mtshan
286'''b4(mdo sde): nyid byang chub ste gang phyir spyad pa'i don de rje su thob par gyur/ chos rnam sanyam pa nyid ni mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas/ bu dang 'brid dang tham dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid rtag
286'''b5(mdo sde): zhugs rnam mi rtog de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par gzhag cing mi 'gyur ba/ phung po kham+ba dang dbang po khas dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/ 'jig rten gsum po nu zla 'dra ste/ 'pho ba med sems can nas ni rme ma
286'''b6(mdo sde): lta bur dngos med de/ mkhyen pas rme la bzhin tu rtog nas 'di gsungs/ byang chub mchog rab rnga'i gang bzhin khyod kyi rnyes/ de ni thob dang ma thob zhes rjod du med/ ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin gakhor lo yA
286'''b7(mdo sde): tshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan dang bral bas rab tu sko ga/ rgal nas seMs can mang po bsam las rab grol ba/ grol nas bcings pa'i nang ni bcings pa shin tu grol/ theg chen bla med
286'''b8(mdo sde): de lnga bsgru ba dngag su 'byin cing // des 'byin mnam pa rnyes pa mya ngan 'das la bgod/ gang na yang seMs can nas yang mya ngan 'das ma chis// sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems
286'''b9(mdo sde): bsla/ sems ci skyes mtshon du byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ 'di pa rnams pas cad yang brtag ma rna lani gzugs rnams ma nga
287a1(mdo sde): khang bzangs dang rta babs dang / skar khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / khri dang / khyogs dang / gling bzhi pa dang / gling bcu drug pa nas/ rta cang shes stong gyis drang ba dang ldan pa'i
287a2(mdo sde): shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu phab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam kha mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis rlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la
287a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag leng la byin cig/ yongasu btang bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces
287a4(mdo sde): bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni bab na/ de yang tshul khrims kyi ba rlol
287a5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i char phob shig/ des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi sngags
287a6(mdo sde): pa ji snyed brjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i char phyob shig/ des tshig de skad ces yon tan dang sngags pa'i smra bar snang las byung ngo // des zhin du zod pa dang /
287a7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / khams gtan dang / shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang ji tsam phyogs btsun/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dasa' rnams yi ges dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda
287a8(mdo sde): dag gis chos kyi sgo rgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las ma lus par rdzogs par 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra de stong gsum gyi sto
287b1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// de ni tshad myed pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su sbyin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
287b2(mdo sde): grangaso me da
287b3(mdo sde): kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' namakha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' shig na 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag
287b4(mdo sde): na'ang yod snyam mo de nas byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi tog pa sems kyis shes so// shes nas k+Sha byang chub
287b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad cen/ smras so rigs bu khyod shin tu dri ma myed cing / shin tu dag pa'i lha'i myig rnyed pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
287b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rnams ci mthong ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang bas lha'i myig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ltas na de la phyog
287b7(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myong dbab tu myed pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu rab pa dang /
287b8(mdo sde): chos kyi sgra thams cad zag pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang ma chad ma lhag byang ma zhugs bar 'di lta ba'i bya ba rnams rab tu byung bar
288a1(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
288a2(mdo sde): mkha' sa mdzod kyi smon lam gyis byin gyi rlabs grub pa de ni khams kyis myi khyab ste/ ga lar yang cig cer sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyed bu dam pas 'di 'dra
288a3(mdo sde): ba'i char mngon par rab tu bab po zhes ched du rjod pa 'di ched du rjod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' marjod kyi rlabs kyis
288a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
288a5(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod kyis rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi chos 'phrul 'di snyan pas grang ba las 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so de nas
288a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab nas cung meng lugs mo lnga ban byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mamakha' mdzad ga la ba dor dong ste/ lhags nas
288b1(mdo sde): byang chub sem dadzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyas bu dam brgyad sems can gyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la yang
288b2(mdo sde): khyang tshal cig de ras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' ram mkha' mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs zung me dadag gi sngon gi khya'i bdag dang /
288b3(mdo sde): mtshan ma dang byibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgya nam mkha' las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
288b4(mdo sde): kyi mdun du khong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzad kyis byung med de dag pa 'di daskad ces smras so//
288b5(mdo sde): sring mo dag bdag gi khyo ji lta bzhin du khrid cig de nas bud med de dag gyis ji lta bur rang rang gis
288b6(mdo sde): khyo gang yin papa khring nas dga' dgu rangasashing rab tu dga' ba ste/ ying bde ba skyes nas rang rang gyi khyim du
288b7(mdo sde): dong ngo // da nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag gis ji
289a1(mdo sde): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar smin par byas so// de nas yang bu med lnga brgya po de dag byang
289a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' namakha' brjod kyi thad du lhags nas/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra// chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon
289a3(mdo sde): ma 'tshal// de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la de smin bgyis/ chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste/ g.yo ba med cing byed
289a4(mdo sde): myed snga nas stong // zag med ye shes bdag gis rab rtog s+ho// slan cad nyon mongs dbang du mi 'chi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni skyed par bgyi/ sems can
289a5(mdo sde): thams cad 'gron du gnyer bar bgyi// sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa bab/ 'dren mchog thub pas
289a6(mdo sde): de dag lung snyan pa/ khyen cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur// spad pa spang nas rgyal ba'i dbang / po dag shin ta dul zhes bya ba'i bde shegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshe na mi
289a7(mdo sde): lnga brgya gsad par chad de/ gsad du khrid pa las/ de dag gis bar snang las sems can rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod ces/ bya ba gang 'jig
289a8(mdo sde): bya'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis/ de la khyed cag phyag tshol cig/ dang gsang ba 'di las thar par 'gyuro zhes smra zhig thos so//
289b1(mdo sde): nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra skang gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' mamakha' mdzod la phyag 'tsha'o// zhes smraso// cig de skad smras ma thag tu
289b2(mdo sde): skad cig de nyid la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs ste/ der lhags nas gshed ma mi de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag bsad cing rung /
289b3(mdo sde): nga chag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer de cag gi srog chod de mi 'di dag khye shig/ de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir bsad bar chad pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dge btang
289b4(mdo sde): ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de bdag bsad do// de nas mi de bsad pa las btang ba de dag bsad pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas byang chub sems
289b5(mdo sde): dpa' na mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la yang
289b6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyor te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag cag gi srog dang dbyin pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag cag chos gang la nan
289b7(mdo sde): tan du babyis pas bdag la smang ba dang / gzhan la sman pas zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos ston pa bdag cag la stsal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'
289b8(mdo sde): mdzod kyi spras pa dang bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed do// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis/ bstod ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung
289b9(mdo sde): khyung cag thun med pa yang dag 'jom pa'i byang chub sen byed ci 'o// de ltang khyed can dag la phan pa dang / gzhanal phan par zhug par gyu'o// de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang /
290a1(mdo sde): cig byin te/ grogs po dag sar bcos bu zung 'di de pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed do// de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zud de/
290a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ska la mngon par gsol to// de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ byang chub kyi phyag kyi chos rnams yang
290a3(mdo sde): dag sgrubs nas/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes lung stan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ byang chub
290a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad mi dengs pa'i na mkha' mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon// nas mkha
290a5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis smras pa/ bcu pa sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci na mkha' skams pa 'am/ zad pa yod dam/ dnges par 'gyur ram/ rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no//
290a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu bzhin tu byang chub de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der sngos pas/ de bas na mkha' mdzod mi/
290a7(mdo sde): skams mi zad mi dengs/ yang khyod kyis na mkha' mdzod bzhan nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba mi kho bos byang chub du sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do// smras
290a8(mdo sde): ba rig kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid yon/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnas gtam na ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das
290b1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' namakha' mdzod kyis byang chub tu sems skyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
290b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di stan nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams mos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/
290b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag mchis kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
290b4(mdo sde): shi ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na gang ga'i glang gi bye ma snyed kyis jig rten gyi khams ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed sangs rgyas kyi rdul snyed kyis yongasu gang bar
290b5(mdo sde): gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi skal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la de lta bur bgrang ba dang / mtshan ma gzhag pas de
290b6(mdo sde): snyed kyi rdul phra mo thams cad zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji snyed nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
290b7(mdo sde): skyed pa'i skal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do// sha ra'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gag gi tha nas byang chub sem dpa' na mkha' 'arjod
290b8(mdo sde): sa dang po// byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan cin sa kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yang sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che 'god pa
291a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i skal pa la sangs rgyas kyi ming thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
291a2(mdo sde): dag zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten 'khyen pa skye bu 'dul bI kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam tham cad
291a3(mdo sde): las shin tu byung ba che rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba ste/ yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
291a4(mdo sde): de dag ni tshe'i tshad skal par gnas kyang bshad par smra ba ma yin no// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de 'khor gyi dkyi 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams stong gyi tshad du gyur te/ byang chub
291a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo // sha ri'i bu de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong sum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis
291a6(mdo sde): dbang skur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyi mi khyab po// de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyi mngon par grub pa sum khri sum stong
291a7(mdo sde): yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming med do// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe tshad kyang skal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo// de nas
291a8(mdo sde): rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang skur bas bar gyi skal pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la snyen bkur dang / rim gro byas te/ nyin cig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong sted
291b1(mdo sde): kyi rim gro che'i phung po zad par gyur pa de lta bas spen kur dang / rim 'gro byas so// de nas rgyal po de'i bsod nams kyis nyan pas/ bu'i tshogs dang grong kyi mi rnams dang /
291b2(mdo sde): 'khor rnams dang / bcas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha tham cad kyis dbang
291b3(mdo sde): skur ba zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi lta // de ci'i phyir zhe nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ stong sum gyi 'khor los sgyur
291b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi dbang skur ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' namakhang
291b5(mdo sde): mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo 'tshar to// bco ldan 'das de 'dra'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu
291b6(mdo sde): chen po rnyes par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ram
291b7(mdo sde): gro dang / sti ltang byas te/ byang chub kyi sems yongasu sbyangs so// gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongasu sbyangs te/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongasu dag pas
291b8(mdo sde): sbyor ba yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yong su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
292a1(mdo sde): byin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu
292a2(mdo sde): phyin pa yong su dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pas/ rtson 'grus
292a3(mdo sde): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dge sbyangs gang ga'i klung
292a4(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
292a5(mdo sde): su dag pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i
292a6(mdo sde): sems dang / bogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sem can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i bo da zer
292a7(mdo sde): yong su dag pas/ byams pa chen po yongasu spangs/ ba nas snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes
292a8(mdo sde): kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
292b1(mdo sde): kyi sems yongs su dag pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/
292b2(mdo sde): skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis thams cad dam skyes bu chen po mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
292b3(mdo sde): ba'i bar du des gang ga'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i / dge ba'i
292b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag gi pas/ nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par/ byang
292b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs susbyangs so// sha ri'i
292b6(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub
292b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te// sha ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du
293a1(mdo sde): / rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod la tha~Md yongasu dag pas gang la yang zad pa med do// de bas na 'di nam khe' mdzod ces bya'o// snyan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpal chel
293a2(mdo sde): spyod mi zad pa dang lag na rim po che rang nam ka 'dzod kyi smon la yongasu spang ba'i bzod pa skyes// de na byub sos dpa' chos kyis rgyal po zhes bya ba de byab sos dpa' namakha' mdzod la 'di la skad ces smrasoka/ rigs kyi bdag cag
293a3(mdo sde): gis na mkha' las chos skrag pa'i mdzod mnyan to// nama'a' mdzod kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bya gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la namakha' la par 'du shes cig dang / mnyan pa/ thos
293a4(mdo sde): de nas byub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / 'khor de dag dang tha~Md dang thal mo sbyar nas/ na mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do// de bya ba sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar sa lnga
293a5(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag phyung ngo // rna mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyi/ thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin yin// de la 'jug pa rab skar kyis// khyed cag mthar kyis nyan par gyis// na mkhan
293a6(mdo sde): la ni ma tho ba med/ dma' ba yang yod pa ma yin te/ gang gi chos nyid mthon dman med/ de la 'dud pa ga la yod/ nas ka la ni skye ba med// 'gog pa dag kyang mi dmyigasaso/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la/
293a7(mdo sde): de la rnam par 'jig pa med// na mkha' la ni 'bri ba med/ gang ba dag kyang mi dmig so// rnam gang med bri ba med// nam kha dang ni mtshungs panya mo// na mkha' ni mun pa med/ de ni de'is ston mi rmongs//
293a8(mdo sde): seMs kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ de bla rnams kyang nyon mongs med/ nyi zla'i ni 'od zer gyis/ na mkha 'dra ba'i sems rnam kyang gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas
293b1(mdo sde): kyang na mkha' la ni ston rmongs med// de bzhin sdug sngal sgo kun gyis/ rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi rmongs/ bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis// na mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med/ rnyed dang sti stang thams cad kyis/ byang chub sem dang 'a dga'
293b2(mdo sde): mi byed/ stong pa dang ni smod pa la/ nam kha yongasu mi rtog ste/ de bzhin bde dang sdug sngal ba/ byang chub sem pa rtan mig go/ sa dag g.yos par 'gyur kyang ni/ na mkha' nam yang g.yob med/ 'jig rten 'di dag g.yo
293b3(mdo sde): 'brug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med/ sreg pa'i skal ba 'byung ba ni/ ji ltar na mkha pa tshig pa/ de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis/ byang chub sem dpa' rten mi gdung skye ba med cing gdung ba'ang med/ ji
293b4(mdo sde): ltar na mkha' gnas pa gzhan/ chos rnams 'od med 'gro ba 'ang med/ chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas/ gzung su snang ba'i ji snyed gam mkha' la ni thams cad 'byung // chosu snang ba ji snyed pa/ de dag chos kyi dbyings
293b5(mdo sde): las 'byung / mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa/ na mkha' ltar yod pa ma yin te/ de ltar sems rnaMs rab shes na/ nam mkha' dang ni tshungs mnya mo// ming tsam pa ni nam mkha' ste/ de la kha dog dbyib kyang
293b6(mdo sde): med/ sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang / ming gyi yongasu snyan pa'o// ji ltar na mkha' mtha' med cing / thams cad du yang bzung du med/ de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang na mkha' dang ni ma nye zhing
293b7(mdo sde): mtshung // sems can na mkhara' 'gro mod kyi/ de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med/ sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang / de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma min// ji ltar sngon gyi mtha'i lus/ na mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba de
293b8(mdo sde): bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshangs// khams bzhi dag kyang na mkha' dang / mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs// 'di ltar sreg pa'i bskal pa dang / na mkha' dang ni khaMs 'di mtshung /
294a1(mdo sde): / de ltar seMs can thas cad kyis/ nas kyang yongasu gang mi nus/ de bzhin yul rnaMs kun gyi kyang / sems kyi rgyud ni mi snang // tshig chen seng gI sgra dag gI// 'jig rten 'gon gyis gsung ba 'di// 'jig
294a2(mdo sde): rten 'das pa'i shes rab gang // de dag snyan pa 'di la ngom// ji ltar na mkha' rgya che ba// mtha' ma dmig par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs chos rnaMs kyang // mtha' ma dmig par mi 'gyuro// chos rnaMm
294a3(mdo sde): thas cad sa r+yas chos/ gang gi yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po dag la'ang mi gan so// dngos dang dngos med rnaMs shwe shing // yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa dngos po dang ni dngos med par/ lta ba ma
294a4(mdo sde): pas mi 'dzin to// stong pa nyid ni sgra'i sa skrag// smra la stong pa nyid med/ de ni sgra med rjod pa med// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sang+yas kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni rjod du med// gang de stong zhe bya ba
294a5(mdo sde): yang // de'i de ni brjod med// sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang // mi yur dang ni brag cha rnaMs// de lnga stsogs pa bshad pa/ sI/ 'dren pa rnas ni chos ston to// seMs can rnas ni drang ba'i phyir dpe rnaMs shin tu kun
294a6(mdo sde): sten te/ rab tu ni ba'i chos rnaMs la// gnyen po rnaMs ni mi dmig so// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu ston// mtshan bzhi mtshan bzhi med pa dag/ chos kyi dbying la mi dmigs so
294a7(mdo sde): mtshan bzhi na mkha' mtshan nyid/ namakha'i mtshan nyid med pa yin/ gang gi tshul 'di rab rnyog ga de dag byang chub seMs dpa' yin// chag pa med cing bcings pa med/ shin tu chung zad med pa ste/ spros med spros dang bral ba de/
294a8(mdo sde): byang chub seMs dpa' the bya'o// sas can la ni de mgrol/ sos can yang mi gan+da shing // sos can rang bzhin ye shwe kyis/ byang chub seMs dpa' de zhes bya// seMs can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nA spang par mi byed/
294b1(mdo sde): gang de byang chub rab zhug pa/ dpa' bo dag gi go cha 'di// sgyu ma byed pas sem+ba can dag/ mang du stsal nas der bsad kyang / de la bsad pa gang yang med/ sems can mtshan nyi de bzhino// sgyu ma dang ni sos can dang /
294b2(mdo sde): myangan 'das dang sang+yas kun/ rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gcig rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs// na mkha' las ni na mkha'i mdzod// mi zad pa'i mdzod grub ste/ sem can thas cad mgu byed cing //
294b3(mdo sde): mdzod zad par mi 'gyuro// tshad bsod nams chu bos/ ni/ mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste/ chos rnams la yang 'pho med par// chos rnam chos nyid lta bar bya// rgyu la rten te byung ba ni// chos rnaMs thas cad
294b4(mdo sde): rab shes na/ de'i mdzod ni mi zad/ chos kyi mdzod ni bsaM mi khyab/ chos bani 'di dag mi zad par/ 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu gsungs/ sos can namal byang chub seMs/ de bzhin sa rgyas chos
294b5(mdo sde): rnaso// de ste de dag rdzas yin na/ de dag yongasu zad 'gyur gyi/ de dag med pas mi zad ces/ de bas de ni mi zad gzungs// chos ni rab tu skad cig gzad pa'i chos ni mi zad de/ mi zad la zad pa med/
294b6(mdo sde): de phyir mi zad pa zhe bya/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhi gis/ chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na/ des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka' byang chub nyid la yang dag zhug/ tshig su bcad pa snyan pa 'di 'byung ni byang chub
294b7(mdo sde): seMs dpa brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu ses skye do// de na 'khor de nyid du byang chub seM sa dpa ltad
294b8(mdo sde): bo can ne bya ba 'dus pa gyur te/ 'dus pa de bcoM ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra sgra 'dig lnga thung swaM du bdag ngo mcher gyur to/ bcoM ldan 'dakyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
295a1(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' namakha' mdzod la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la lan ldon no// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' ltad mo can gis/ byang chub sems dpa
295a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sgra 'di dag las byung snyam du bdag ltad sor 'dzin par gyur to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyis bu 'di ji snyam
295a3(mdo sde): du seM saM/ brag cha'i sna ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las brag sgra 'byung // smras pa rigs kyi bu brag la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs saM/
295a4(mdo sde): kha dog gam/ dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smras ga rigs kyi bu de ni med do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhi no// ji ltar brag cha yongasu ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin du rnamakha'
295a5(mdo sde): yongasu ma grub ste/ sgra dang skad go bar byed par 'gyuraro// smras pa rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa su/ gang nas dbyangs 'byung / smras pa rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par rig par
295a6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kho bos yid sems pas gang sam pa de bar snang 'di las 'byung yang seMs dang 'gro ba 'ang medado// de 'dir 'ong ba yang med mod kyi sgra rnyan kyang 'byung ngo // rig
295a7(mdo sde): kyi bu rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa ltos/ gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung / yang rgyu 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'pho la/ rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no//
295a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste rgyu dang rkyen la 'bras bu mngon par grub pa'i chos 'di gnyi ka la yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do// gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
295a9(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsung so// kun nas nyon mongs pa stsal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun nas nyon
295b1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi de ni rnam par byang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba 'di ni gnyi ka yang bda'i tshi go don pa'i mtha' la kun
295b2(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dmig su med do// don dam pa'i mtha' ni 'tha' ma yin te/ gang 'di mtha' ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// gang yang
295b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha'o// gang bdag gi mtha' de ni chos thas cad kyi mtha' ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
295b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni de'i mtha'i stong pa nyid kyi mtha' nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni chos thams cad kyi mi chags pa'i ye shes
295b5(mdo sde): rnyed do// de nas gnas brtan sha ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' ltad mod can la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ltad mo can zhes ming sus btags/ smras
295b6(mdo sde): ga sha ri'i bu khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang / brtson pa de dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhi no// smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du kho
295b7(mdo sde): bos chos thas cad 'dun cing rtson pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du/ ltad mo dang ldan te de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes
295b8(mdo sde): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thas cad la kho bos ltad mor gyur to// sems can thas cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad
295b9(mdo sde): mo can zhes bya'o// gang kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang 'jug pa de gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas rtar
296a1(mdo sde): sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad yongasu brjod do// sa ng+yas
296a2(mdo sde): kyi chos thas cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi gags te/ chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub
296a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge
296a4(mdo sde): 'dzin rab tu ston pa rtson te/ gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongasu sbyang bar bya ba la spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'
296a5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin ce na dpal la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu byang chub seMs dpa' rnas kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying po thogs pa med
296a6(mdo sde): par 'gro bas bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub seMs dpa' rnaMs kyi ting nge 'dzin seMsaM can thas cad la khong khro ba med pa'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba
296a7(mdo sde): yod/ de bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyi gnod pa thas cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ses can yongasu dag par
296a8(mdo sde): 'acu'o rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting 'dzig dge ba'i chos bas pad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyu'o// dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rlog pa med par 'gyu'o/ mngon par
296b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug ltar mthong bar 'gyuraro// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa thas cad 'dul bar 'gyuraro// 'khyil
296b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos g.yas phyogs kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyu dang / lta ba las rnam par
296b3(mdo sde): zlog par 'gyur ro// dga' ba byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos kyi kun dga' zhes mos par 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rje su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni//
296b4(mdo sde): sbyin gnas yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems mi 'jug par 'gyur ro// mtshungs par mnyam par 'jug
296b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro// byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las rnam par smin pa la/
296b6(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur ro// seng ge'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ 'jigs pa dang / spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ro// sems
296b7(mdo sde): dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i// bdud thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// pad ma kar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ 'jig
296b8(mdo sde): rten thos cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro// pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems kyi rkyen du 'gyur ro// 'od bkod pa zhes
297a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas thos cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro//
297a2(mdo sde): bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni// rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur// rgyal mtshan rtse'i
297a3(mdo sde): dpung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyu ro//
297a4(mdo sde): skar mda' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nibag chags thas cad
297a5(mdo sde): 'joms par 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'iting nge
297a6(mdo sde): 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro//
297a7(mdo sde): 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'iting nge
297b1(mdo sde): 'dzin ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro//
297b2(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni// yon tan gyi chos
297b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yongs 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sred med
297b4(mdo sde): kyi bu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni// pha rol rko ba thas cad 'jom par 'gyur ro//
297b5(mdo sde): snying po'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni// rdo rje'i
297b6(mdo sde): lus mi phyed par 'gyur ro// // snying rje dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam bcas
298a1(mdo sde): pa tham cad nyis 'og tu chung bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni// mngon pA shrI ba las mi nyes par 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni byang chub kyi snying por/
298a2(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyu ro// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos thas cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sos dang spyod pa la
298a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i ye shesu 'gyu ro// sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin ni chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa 'gyu ro// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzem pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag pA 'da' bar 'gyur ro// lus
298a4(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin ni gzugs thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyu ro// mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni seMs rtse gcig tu 'gyu ro// rnam par la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
298a5(mdo sde): 'dzin ni dmigs pa tham cad yongasu dag par 'gyu'o// non mongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'ad bar bar 'gyuraro// 'khor lo dri ma med pa
298a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// grog 'od ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin ni sems kyi skad cig 'dzag pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// leg par byas pas rno bar rgyal ba te
298a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro// lus kyi rkyen cig bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan/
298a8(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu'o// ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mangs pa'i sgra skad sbags pas/ sos can thams cad kyi sem mgu bar 'gyuraro// sos kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
298b1(mdo sde): tingange 'dzin las mi nyams par 'gyuraro// rten pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyu ro// mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can tha dad pa med par 'gyuraro// tshul khrims
298b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin ni sngon laM thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i go bgos zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon
298b3(mdo sde): par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyuraro// ci'ang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin ni gzugs med pa'i khams la yongasu sbyong bar 'gyuraro//
298b4(mdo sde): lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcu'i rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi skar
298b5(mdo sde): mda' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sgrib dang chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyuraro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las dang bya ba sna tshogs la 'gyur ro// mtha'
298b6(mdo sde): yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lta ba thams cad yongasu gcod par 'gyu ro// stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni dmigs pa dang lta ba thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro// mtshan ma med pa nye bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni rtog
298b7(mdo sde): pa dang rnam pa rtog pa dang yongasu rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro// smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni smon laM thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang /
298b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams 'jom par 'gyuraro// sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni spobs pa thog pa med pa 'gyur ro// kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni thos pa thas cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
298'a1(mdo sde): dran pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzidzi ni zad med pa'i snod kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam thams cad rtsol par 'gyur/ mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i de 'dzin ni sems can zad ma du bar 'o//
298'a2(mdo sde): rin chen dkod pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin ni lag na rin po che rab tu rnyed par 'gyuraro// rjesu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni sems can tha~Md kyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba
298'a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba thams cad rtogs par 'gyuraro// blo gros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang yid rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin ni pos
298'a4(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi char rab tu 'beb so// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyuraro// chos rjesu dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ni 'dod
298'a5(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i chos sngon du byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos las mi ldog par 'gyuraro// btong ba rje su
298'a6(mdo sde): dran pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin ni phung po thams cad rab tu 'dod par 'gyuraro// tshul khrims rje su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rtsa ba la rab tu 'god par 'gyur//
298'a7(mdo sde): sgra rjesu dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i chos la kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyuraro// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni chos thaMd yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyuraro// nam kham
298'a8(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos bas cad la chags pa seng bar 'gyuraro// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos thod bathob par 'gyur/ rgyung chags pa dngababyung gajom
298'b1(mdo sde): rjes rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni// yi ge thaMd cig rab tu 'byed pa shes pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na byang chub ses dpa' de sa sa skang cis
298'b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting 'dzin brgyad cu ste// ting nge 'dzin de re re la yang 'khor ting 'dzin gyi sgo
298'b3(mdo sde): brgya yod do// de dag thams cad sdoms na/ ting 'dzin pazhi khrir 'gyur te/ de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs par dang / rnam par byang bas ting 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyuraro// de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
298'b4(mdo sde): mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i ye shes kyis ting 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyura'o// ting 'dzin ji snyed pa chos kyi sdom pa yang de snyed/ chos kyi phung po yang de sted/ de'i phyir sems can
298'b5(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / spyong ba la
298'b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i sems can rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mdog gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dag dang / sems can gyi spyod pa mtha' dag la 'dug pa'i tshad med pas gyis mi khyab ste/
298'b7(mdo sde): skal par rgya stong gyi mthar ni 'dug kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dis yongasu bstan cing / ting 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stod ni/
298'b8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis mngon par sgrubs pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
298'b9(mdo sde): skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa nam mkha' mdzod la legs so nas bya babyin te/
299a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// kabam po lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom
299a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
299a3(mdo sde): kyis thog ma nam mtha' la 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu 'ang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpa' la 'di
299a4(mdo sde): skad ces paka'astsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus ma/ bzhal bgrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi yang ces/ pha rol tugyur ba de'i tshe de dus ma de zhin
299a5(mdo sde): sa pa la pa lta rjeg sa rgyu sa sa / shegs pa sa skye
299a6(mdo sde): na seMn na
299a7(mdo sde): k+Shak+Sha
299a8(mdo sde): mang po nga mes la / rin pa cam chun gyi yang ga/ bang mad / gzhan pa dgas rigan bdag 'a la ga
299b1(mdo sde): ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsel ba/ sna tshogs kyis rnams par smras pa/ dmig mangs ris su bris pa/ lag 'thil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig bsams pas/
299b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ltar 'dug go// mi de dag thams cad kyang / gzhal med khang dang /
299b3(mdo sde): khang partsegs pa na gnas par gyur cig/ bsams pas/ zas dang skom rab tu 'byor to// de yang rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs par/ dri ma me pa'i 'od mtha'
299b4(mdo sde): yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byung ngo // yang rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor
299b5(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po// bsod nams kyis rgyan pa zhes bya ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang / ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis
299b6(mdo sde): brgyan pa de'i khang pa 'dzam bu'i gling gyi dbus su rtsegs par gyur to// shar phyogs su yang dpag tshad bzhi/ nub phyogs dang / lce baphyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang
299b7(mdo sde): dpag tshang ba ni bzhi nga / bkra ba lta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ skyed mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'i/ yang rigs kyi bu/ rgyal bsod nam
299b8(mdo sde): kyis rgya na'i btsun mo rgyad khri bzhi stong yod de thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go// khye'u brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang tshan po che chen po
300a1(mdo sde): stobs dang drag shul ba chang ba sha stag go// yang rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan phal btsun mo rin po che gnyis
300a2(mdo sde): // gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi gzi 'dzing / gcig gi min ni dpal gyi 'ong ngo // rgyal po ri'i bsod nams kyis brgyan bri de dag bo bkong pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos
300a3(mdo sde): du zhugs so// btsun mo'i ze na 'dug pa'i tshe lha mo de'i gnas gyi pang pa nas/ khye'u gnyis byung ste/ rngus te skyes pa/ sngon sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ smom lam rdzogs bzan
300a4(mdo sde): med pa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byachub tu mngon par zhugs pa ste/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge zhes bya/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes rba ste/ de bzhis
300a5(mdo sde): thung ma thag tu sgra skang dang / dbyang sa gcig tu la bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras so// sngon byas dge dang mi dge chung zi ba/ de bzhin
300a6(mdo sde): gshegs la mchos byas chung mi za/ bsams 'byang chub sems kyang chud mi za/ sgra brtsor byed thos pa chud mi za sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chung mig bzod dang
300a7(mdo sde): nges pa rnams kyang chud mig bza byas pa bzo zhing dgi 'i las bya phyir/ rtson 'grus rtsoms pa byang chub chung mi za/ rtse gcig bsams gtan dang ni rnam par sems
300a8(mdo sde): nges par rtog dang shes rab sems mi 'ams ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'azhugs te/ mi bakhrugs chos las byang chub rnyed mi dga' de ni nyon mongs pa yis ni
300b1(mdo sde): gos te/ de ni mar kyang mngal du mi gnas shing / de ni pad ma'i snying por rdzus te skye/ mi gos pa ni pad ma chu las ltar// shar phyogs logs su rgyal ba stan pa
300b2(mdo sde): rgyal/ dus sam mi chags ye shes ram pa'i bde gshegs dri med bod kyi gan nas su/ chos 'dod phyir ni de nas bdag cag phongs/ u du mang ba ri'i me tog ji
300b3(mdo sde): lta bar// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dkas// de la snyen bkur bgyi dang lta slad du// bde gshegs zang du yab kyang bzhung bar bgyi// rgyal pos rje su stan
300b4(mdo sde): ba 'di thongs nas// bung btsun mo 'khor dang ldan tu// srog chags byed pa stong gis longs skor te// rgyal po'i gan du nye bar dong // me tog dri zhim byug par bcas pa yin
300b5(mdo sde): de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas nas// zhabs le phyag 'tshal rab tu skor byas te// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas spyan sngar 'dug/ seng ge dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro
300b6(mdo sde): yang // de bzhin gshegs 'i zhabs la gzung nas su// gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yi// 'phags pa des ni tshigs bcad 'di dag smras/
300b7(mdo sde): khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang pung gnyen te// 'jig rten ldongs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur sems can rnams kyi bsam sbyong gyur la 'khas// ji ltar mos
300b8(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gnas par mdzod// rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas mos gzugs dang sgo dang bro dang bcas pas bcings// nam yang ston pa la ni mchod phyir
301a1(mdo sde): / 'khor yang 'chi bar gnas pa'i grogasu 'gyur ba med/ sbyin du la kun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni dag po rol 'gro ba'i grogs yi no// de'i gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzos/
301a2(mdo sde): rdzu 'bul dag kyang ci 'drar bar ltos la gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na/ byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sem skyed cig rgyal po bal blang des ni chos thos nas slob chags bye ba stong phrag bdun
301a3(mdo sde): ngang sras nga bar ston/ bcom ldan mgon po lta la brgya cu sring nam kar 'phags bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs/ 'di chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon la/ zos nas de la chos bzhin nan tan gyis
301a4(mdo sde): 'dong ba mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srig srog ni rtse'i zil pa'i rig pa 'ang / rtse de bzhin 'dod pa rmi lam 'dra mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dka' ba skyed// sem can gang 'dod pas ngoms sbed
301a5(mdo sde): de phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pas sgom zhig rgyug/ byas pa ngoms mi shes shing yul la gnas/ shes rab gang ngoms dag shin tu ngoms/ sgyu ma slu zhing snying po me ba ltar/ de bzhin dung
301a6(mdo sde): po lnga yang sgyu ma 'dra// mkhas rnams 'di dag sbrul gdug bzhin pu sten// dbang po drug ni stong pa'i grong dang 'dra bu dang chung ma rgyal srid yul 'khor yang 'chi bar gnas pa'i
301a7(mdo sde): grogasu 'gyur ba mod/ sbyin du la sun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni de dag pha rol 'dra ba'i grag yino// de'i gzugs yon tan spros pa rdzogs/ rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci 'drar
301a8(mdo sde): rab thos lags ta 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dong na/ byang chubadam pa 'di phyir sems snyed cig rgyal thob pa glang ngas nim thas nas phra sros chags bya ba stang zag bdun cu dang sras
301a9(mdo sde): bcu ma btsungs pacam thong mi rnams byang chub ngas pa 'di byer sems kyang de bdag cag ma chag gi sems skyeng par bgyi/ khams can thams cad 'byin du gnyer bar /
301b1(mdo sde): byang chub sbyong mchog yid ngong spud par bgyi/ 'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur bgyi// rigs bu da ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi rgyan pa ngas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
301b2(mdo sde): pa la lo ngargya khri bzhi stong gi bar du rung ba yi du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bang ba'i yod byang dang yongasu long sprod pa thams cad kyis rim gro byas so// khye'u seng ge lhal gyis 'gro ba de
301b3(mdo sde): nyis bcom ldan 'das ngo'i ston pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri yang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas seng ge seng ge
301b4(mdo sde): rtsal gis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub phyogs kyi chos dang yo byad snang ba dang / bde bar spyod pa la sbyor ba zhing rtson pas ring por ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do// de dag
301b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa rnyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas/ de gnyis kyis sems can tshad ched grangs
301b6(mdo sde): med pa yongasu smin par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/ rgyal po
301b7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po ga la ba der song ba dang / des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung
301b8(mdo sde): bar mthong dzad/ mthong nas kyang ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis snyen kur byas nas/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas/ ngas mi byas
302a1(mdo sde): nga rgyu pa mas rgyas du kra r+dz+dza ngas r+m+ma r+m+mAskA
302a2(mdo sde): bsod rnams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems khyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gri ba la 'di skad ces dga' stsal to//
302a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs ston na/ 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyis shig
302a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyis shig byang chub kyi lam+bu 'bar bar gyis shigasems can thams cad nim par gyis shig pas kyi
302a5(mdo sde): mas ca tshunam mangs pa mas chu
302a6(mdo sde): kyi sems rnam par rol pa ston cing de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sbrul gyis 'grabs de'i dus na nam mkha' leg pas byugs nas rnam mkha' la log
302a7(mdo sde): pas thugs da stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug dug yas so/
302b1(mdo sde): de nas des yang nam mkhal lag pas byugs pa dang de nas de'i che bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ma grol bar
302b2(mdo sde): gra byung ngo // de nas yang nam mkha' pa lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas bar snang
302b3(mdo sde): las sngon ma mthom thos pa'i dri zhim zhing 'jim pa/ katsa lini dika ltar reg nade ba'i me tog rnams
302b4(mdo sde): kyi char bab pa/ de nas yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas de ma thag
302b5(mdo sde): tshu bar snang las rin pa che thams kyi cher rab tu mngon par thos long skyong dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab bo//
302b6(mdo sde): de lta bur myong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der lo byang thams cad kyi cher mngon par rab tu bab pa/ de lta bu'i bas da sgom
303a1(mdo sde): dang bro ba'i char mngon par rab tu bab po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brtan pa
303a2(mdo sde): la 'di skad pa sa laganya stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyed kyis sbyin pa yongasu btang ba dang / rin po che char 'bab pa 'di gang mang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i char 'di dper bgyi ba sla ba ma lags te/
303a3(mdo sde): ma du mang ba mchis so// bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i stsal gyis 'gro ba 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dod na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
303a4(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su 'di 'dra ba'i rid pa che'i char mngon par 'i bar lo// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngos shing tshim par byed// rigs kyi
303a5(mdo sde): tsha 'dumarnapa pa'i rnapas kyilas la 'jimams bskyed pa gtunas sa pa rin po ma 'ams pa kyi mngon par ma su lapa lags kyang chu mam sa dpa' 'di
303a6(mdo sde): badza du cur bgras zhes sgra byung ngo // ji stangs pa'i lha rnams kyis sna byung ba de bzhin du bar snang dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris dang / sum bcu drug cu dang / 'tha' 'bras dang / pa' ldan dang/
303a7(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' nas tshang chen gyi bar gi lha rnams kyis kyang ma la/ 'di sems bskyed ma thag tu 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char rab tu 'bab pa las na/ k+She ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dam
303a8(mdo sde): mdza du tub sa skam ges khrung bas meng de la bangam ldan 'das de bzhi pa shed 'a drim med pa'i 'dim thar las 'a byed kyi rgyal bar yul ra pa zang ma dang sa mi 'ang rol gang gi runga'i byas srid kyis kyis
303a9(mdo sde): thams mas das pal na 'dus rgya ba danam kyi ldan pa da chu mas da' ba 'i sa rgyam 'thab ma pa gas pa dang / ba dang gas
303b1(mdo sde): de mthong nas khye'u rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba rgyal por bcug ste/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sbyin pa 'di ni sem kun du chag pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sems yongasu dag pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang dgi bgen so//
303b2(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba ni lus dang ngag yongasu sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni bgeg chen po'o// rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thaMd nye bar zhi ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni rtsa dang lo ma'o// rab tu byung ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o// sbyin pa 'di
303b3(mdo sde): ni ri'i ba dang bcas shing yongasu 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu 'byung ba ni yongasu 'dzin pa zad 'dor ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma spyod pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni lta ba thaMd yongasu sbyor ba'o// sbyin
303b4(mdo sde): ba 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo'i sbyor ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni dul ba dang zhi bcang shes bI sa'o// snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor zhing / sems de lta bu dang bsam de lta bu'i de ltar rab tu byung ste/ gcig pa mi 'dra ba/ bag yod pa/ brtson
303b5(mdo sde): garab tu dben par gnas pas ring po ma thogs pas mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nas kyi brgyan par gyur pa de bzhin zhig yin ste du khyed sos na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir
303b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ de bzhin gabye ba 'khor ba 'jig ste/ de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor lo'i sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nas brgyan ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub seMs dpA na mkha' mdzod 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sem dpa' seng
303b7(mdo sde): ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ des thog mar na mkha'i mdzod las rin po che'i char phab po// de tshun chad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med pA nam yang na mkha'i mdzod la
303b8(mdo sde): rin po che'i char 'beb 'i mngon par shes pa las man po// rigs kyi bu ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub seMs dab seng ge zhes lnga bar gyur to// byang chub semA dang byas pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyam bu rgyas pa'i no gros zhes bya
304a1(mdo sde): @#/ par gyur te/ nga rgyal po bsod nas kyi brgyan pas rgyal bar bcug pa/ rigs kyi bu de gsung rab kyang 'di ltar dga' zhing yongasu dag par gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnas kyi gnas gyur to// sem
304a2(mdo sde): can ji snyed kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag tha~Md kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldod par gyur to// sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i
304a3(mdo sde): gti 'di bstan pa na srog chag khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu sem bskyed do// de nas bco ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa na mkha' mdzod kyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan
304a4(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sem dang seMm dbu chen po rnam kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i laM gang lag/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcoM ldan 'das kyis nam khwa mdzod la 'di skad ces// stsol to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sem das
304a5(mdo sde): rjes kyi yi zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi cho su cu rtsa bdun dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bas gtan dang bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
304a6(mdo sde): gzug med pa'i sto pA 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnaMs te/ ribA kyi bu 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i li zhes bya'o// 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o// de la byang
304a7(mdo sde): chub sem dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig na sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs sdug bsngal bar rig na sbyin pa sbyin pa sbyin// gzugs bdag med par rig/ gzugs zhi bar rig/ gzugs stong par rig
304a8(mdo sde): gzugs tshad med par rigs/ gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ gzugs ma skyes par rig/ gzugs byung bar rigs/ gzugs rten cing 'brel bar
304a9(mdo sde): 'byung bar rig gzugs dben par rig/ gzugs gzung du med par rig/ gzugs kun zhi med par rig/ gzugs 'byung bar med par rig/ gzugs sgyu ma lta bur rig/ gzugs mi
304b1(mdo sde): lam lta bur rig/ gzugs sdig sgyu lta bur rig/ gzugs chu zla lta bur rig/ gzugs brag cha lta bur rig/ gzugs mig yor lta bur rig/ gzugs sgra brnyan lta bur rig/
304b2(mdo sde): gzugs rtsa dang shing dang laM dang / mig yor lta bur rig nas/ sbyin pa sbyin te/ de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug go/ sbyin pa'i de bzhin de
304b3(mdo sde): nyid kyis sngo ba'i de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems
304b4(mdo sde): can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyi chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// gang chos thams cad de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin
304b5(mdo sde): nyid med de/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten
304b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i la mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
304b7(mdo sde): ba dang / bdag med par rig/ rnam par shes pa zhi bar rig/ rnam par shes pa stong par rig/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med par rig/ rnam par shes pa
304b8(mdo sde): smon pa med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma skyes par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma byung bar rig/ rnam par
304b9(mdo sde): shes pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar riganas/ sbyin pa sbyin no// rna bar shes pa dben par rig/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba med par rig/ rnam par shes kun gzhi med par rig
305a1(mdo sde): @rnam par shes pa mi 'byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rmi lam lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta bur rig/ rnam
305a2(mdo sde): par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa brag cha lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa mig yor lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa
305a3(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa de bzhin nyid rjes su shes// sbyin pa'i de zhin nyid kyis
305a4(mdo sde): sngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin
305a5(mdo sde): nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu sheso// gang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid med de/

305a7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i lamo// gzhan yang rig kyi byi byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag par rig nas// tshul khrims bsrung ba nas/ gzugs rtsa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang
305a8(mdo sde): lam dang gzugs bstan lta bu'i bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung // de gzugs de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// tshul
305b1(mdo sde): khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis snga nga'idi bzhin cid dang / snga ba'i di bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyid bzhin ted dang / byang chub kyi bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang
305b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
305b3(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin nyid med de ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjesu shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chubams
305b4(mdo sde): dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims srung ba
305b5(mdo sde): nas rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi de bzhin
305b6(mdo sde): nyid rje su shes// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyis kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyi dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
305b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi de bzhin dang sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
305b8(mdo sde): rjesu sheso// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid med do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid // de bzhin
306a1(mdo sde): nyid rje su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// bsam gtan
306a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ bzod pa bsgom pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjesu shes pa de lta bus brtson
306a3(mdo sde): 'grus rnam mo// bsam gtan mnyam par 'jog go// shes rab rnam par dpyod do// des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/
306a4(mdo sde): gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang rtsig pa dang / lam dang mi lor lta bu'i bar du rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis shes
306a5(mdo sde): rab kyi de bzhin nyid rje su shes so// shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
306a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams
306a7(mdo sde): cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do//
306a8(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid rje su shes pas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
306b1(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
306b2(mdo sde): kyi bar du rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes// shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba/
306b3(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin

306b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i la mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa
306b7(mdo sde): nas/ gzugs rtsa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ska mo//

307a1(mdo sde): @med/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhanam yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rje su shes pas lus lal kyai rje sup+ta ning dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
307a2(mdo sde): ste/ lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
307a3(mdo sde): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ rgya cher de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / sems dang chos rnams kyang
