334a3(mdo sde): zhes 'dzer to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rigs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshigs gang
334a4(mdo sde): gis 'dud gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed byang chub la bkod pa bdud tshar gcod pa'i rig pa 'di ga sngags kyi tshig la khyod spobs par bgyi shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
334a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ de'i tshig rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smraso// 'di lta ste/ a ba Sha te/ saM Da te/ sa hi tra nu/ sa d+hi du rung ta ra ne ni rgA tra naM mai t+ya/ yug
334a6(mdo sde): te/ ka ru Na ni sh+ya na te/ sad t+ya ba ni/ b+ha'u ra ga kra d+hArma nir brid te/ d+harma rag kra/ ug khu li ni khyi li ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tad ka re/ tad thA bA ti te/
334a7(mdo sde): shI la nu ba ra rti/ a kA ya ni rde she/ gra shA ba ka ri she/ bud d+ha/ d+ha shI te/ d+ha mo dza la ni/ sang g+ha nu ga me/ a nud d+ha re/ a na ti ka ma nI/ ye na gra hA nI/ ma ra
334a8(mdo sde): bkra s+ya yug ti kr-i te/ a nang De/ a rang sde/ swa bi sha ya nug me/ ar+ya ru ga na ga re/ sing d+ha sid d+ha pa de/ mo kA ru ku le ni/ gra ba ni/ ba ra so pra ba de nAs
334b1(mdo sde): d+ha sha ni mar par shed a bi shan tu/ tsatra ro ma hA rA dzA na/ sha gro de bA nA myin tra/ brah+ma sa ha ba ti/ bud d+ha pra san na/ de ba na ga yag kra gri tam pa ri tra na na sta ba
334b2(mdo sde): tame/ swa stA ya nan d+ha narma bA nA ka nA nA kA ra kA ye sad d+harma s+ya tsa pa ri kra ha ye// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig
334b3(mdo sde): 'di dag smras ma thag tu/ skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug du g.yos so// bdud kyi bu lnga brgya ma dad cing chos ma yin pa 'dod
334b4(mdo sde): pa de dag gis/ bar snang las sgra 'di skad ces bdud dam bdud kyi bu 'am/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang / rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag thos nas/ byang chub tu
334b5(mdo sde): sems mi skyed cing / bdud kyi las rnams mi 'dor ba de la gnod smon lag na rdo rjes rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas spyi bo 'gems so zhes thos nas bdud
334b6(mdo sde): kyi bu de dag gis/ bar snang la ltas pa dang / de dag gis lag na rdo rje lnga brgya bdag gi spyi bo la rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje thogs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag 'jigs
334b7(mdo sde): shing skrag ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / mdzum pa de'i don/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btso
334b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag 'jigs shing skrag ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
335a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nam bdun
335a2(mdo sde): sdig can de byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de dag thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
335a3(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid na bdud sdig can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byadu chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de byang
335a4(mdo sde): chub thob nas ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdad sdig
335a5(mdo sde): can 'di rung yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdud kyi bya ba byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang / rdo rje snying po nyon mongs pa rab
335a6(mdo sde): tu 'joms pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cho ga gsang ba dang / spyod lam dang yon tan dang /
335a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi gnas dang / spyod pa dang / cho ga dang sbyor ba mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam gyis byang chub kyi sems de brten par gyur pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
335a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la bdud sdig can 'di yang tha mar bdud kyi las byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin nas/
335b1(mdo sde): semapa med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang chos kyi snang ba thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rjes su song zhing / byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i 'og tu grangs med pa dang /
335b2(mdo sde): bgrangs pa la 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byed de/ sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
335b3(mdo sde): ngag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rab tu byung nas kyang dam pa'i chos dus gsum du yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa yang byang chub la yongs su
335b4(mdo sde): smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de de'i 'og tu bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi bcu bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/
335b5(mdo sde): par spong ba'i bskal pa la yongs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shin tu gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
335b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o// yang kun dga' bo yongasu dag pa
335b7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de 'byor pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lha dang mis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na kun dga'
335b8(mdo sde): bo dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra bar sems can de dag gi longs spyod pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu
336a1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos snang ba thob pa ces bya ba'i cha'i ched ni bar gyi bskal pa bani bcu thob par 'gyur ro// nyan thos bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi nyan
336a2(mdo sde): thos kyi 'dus pa chen por 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha da
336a3(mdo sde): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa 'di dag tham cad kyang / yongs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/ bcom
336a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
336a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// bdud sdig can lung bston par 'gyur ro// bdud sdig can lung bstan par bshad pa 'di rab tu stan pa na 'khor
336a6(mdo sde): der 'dus pa'i rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'di ltar bdud kyi las de snyed bgyis kyang / de bzhin gsheg
336a7(mdo sde): pa mthong ba don yod pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs
336a8(mdo sde): bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ngo mtshar to/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo su zhig gang zag la gang zag gis chod bzung / bcom ldan
336b1(mdo sde): 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma lags so// zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das
336b2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// grogs po dag ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lo// 'on kyang grogs po dag sems ni rten cing 'brel
336b3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba ste/ ngas sems can de dag chags pas/ gom pa 'dag cing chags pa dang bral bas/ gom pa 'jog pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pas chos gos 'dzin
336b4(mdo sde): pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyon pa dang / len pa dang bcas pas zan kham gis gcod pa dang / len pa med par med pa mthong ste/ kye grogs po dag sems
336b5(mdo sde): can gyi spod pa ni sna tshogs so// mgo smos pas go ba dang / smras te bshad pas go ba dang / tshig lhur len pa'i sems can dag yod de/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa so
336b6(mdo sde): so co rigs par chos la gzud par snyan pa'i gtam rnams gzung ngo // kye grogs po de dag nyon mongs pa ni yul 'ang mi gnas shing / phyogs la 'ang mi gnas te/ nyon mong
336b7(mdo sde): pa ni bstsags pa 'ang med/ phung po'i dngos po yang med do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa byung bas nyon mongs pa byung ngo // tshul bzhin byung bas rnam par dag pa byung ngo //
336b8(mdo sde): de la de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba de tshul bzhin brtags na rnam par dag pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngas 'di las dgongs te log par lta ba la/ log par
337a1(mdo sde): lta ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes na/ de de'i yang dag par lta ba yin no zhes tshig sa smra so// nam yang log par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta bar
337a2(mdo sde): ma gyur mi 'gyur/ 'gyur ba med do// 'on kyang ji ltar log par lta bar rig nas/ de la mi gnas rab tu mi gnas/ spyod pa med pa rab tu spyod pa med pa de na yang dag par
337a3(mdo sde): lta ba'i lam la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// kye grogs po dag nyon mos pa ni sgrib pa med pa'o// rnam par rig pa ni snang ba'o// nyon mongs pa ni nyam chung ba
337a4(mdo sde): 'o// lhag mthong ni stobs dang ldan pa'o// nyon mongs pa ni glo bur te/ rang bzhin ni rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'o// nyon mongs pa ni kun tu rtag pa'o// rang bzhin ni kun tu rtog
337a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po 'di ni chu la rton to// chu ni rlung la rten to// rlung ni nam mkha' la rten to// nam mkha' ni rten pa med do// de bzhin
337a6(mdo sde): du sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi po 'di dag pas nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi nang na stobs che zhing sra
337a7(mdo sde): steng skyugs pa med pa'o// tshogs pa med cing ma skyes ma 'gags pa ste/ rang gi ngang tshul gyis gnas pa'o// de la gang khams gsum po de dag ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa
337a8(mdo sde): ldan pa mi gnas pa ring du mi gnas pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'gyur bar snang gi nam mkha'i khams la ni 'gyur ba gang yang med do// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye
337a9(mdo sde): mched ni las dang nyon mongs pa la gnas pa'o// las dang nyon mongs pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnaso// tshul bzhini ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i nga
337b1(mdo sde): bzhin yongs su dag pa la gnas te/ de'i phyir sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs shes bya'o// de la gang tshul bzhin ma
337b2(mdo sde): yin pa yid la byed pa dang / gang las dang nyon mongs pa dang / gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyang rgya dang rkyen kyis yang dag par zin na ni ske/ rgyu
337b3(mdo sde): dang rkyen ma tshogs na 'gag ste gang de'i rang bzhin de la ni rgyu yang med rkyen kyang med/ tshogs pa yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med do// de la nam mkha'i kham
337b4(mdo sde): ji ltar rang bzhin yang de bzhin no// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ji lta bar rlung yang de bzhin no// las dang nyon mongs pa ji lta bar chu yang de bzhin no// pung
337b5(mdo sde): po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ji ltar sa'i khams dad kyang de bzhin te/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa zhes bya ste/ snying po med pa'i rtsa
337b6(mdo sde): ba mi gnas pa'i rtsa ba/ dag pa'i rtsa ba/ rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba'o// kye grogs po dag de ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sgo gang la
337b7(mdo sde): brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgo la mi chags shing rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad kyang mi snyems pa'o// de dag thams cad
337b8(mdo sde): snyems pa yang dag par bcom pas/ tshul dang 'dra bar 'gro ba'i lam kho nga chud de/ bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de dag bdud kyi
338a1(mdo sde): yul la yang dag par 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas par
338a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// rdo ga sangs rgyas kyi dus la tu gnas pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sum la 'jug par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi lums ldan pa
338a3(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi yul 'khrug par mi byed par 'gyur ro// de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ mnyam pa bye brag med pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
338a4(mdo sde): rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po shig/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba dang / 'gyod
338a5(mdo sde): ba kun nas ldang ba dang / 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par 'gyur to// /
338a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po brgyad pa'o// // de nas dge snyen dpal spras shes bya bas/
338a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par grol ba'i sgos kyi nim grangs
338a8(mdo sde): 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi slad du bshad do// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la sred pa'i slad du/ shul zhugs
338b1(mdo sde): gyis bltam par bgyi ste/ bshos kyang dug dang bsres pa sbyar pa des/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis chos mang du thos kyang 'gyod pa rab tu bskul pa ma nus
338b2(mdo sde): kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ 'gyod pa de thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur te/ chos thams cad la snang ba 'ang skyes so//
338b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'gyod pa ma mchis the tsom ma mchis te/ snang ba thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se saM skyed par bgyi ste/ bcom
338b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ltar bdag kyang khyad par du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag legs so legs so// ngas
338b5(mdo sde): bshad pa'i don khyed kyis khong du chud de nges khyim bdag khyod la lung bstan kyis/ sems dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dis bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom
338b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das thams cad la lci stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim 'gror byas te mchod nas/ de dag gi thad nas tshangs par spyad pa spod par 'gyur de dag gi dam pa'i
338b7(mdo sde): chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa snyed cig mnyes par byas te/ bskal pa grangs med
338b8(mdo sde): pa bdun brgya na/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang bya rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabs
339a1(mdo sde): su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas dge snyen dpal sbas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
339a2(mdo sde): las bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yid rangs ste rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
339a3(mdo sde): te/ rgyan ci thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skal gsol nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim na gter chen po bzhi mchis te/
339a4(mdo sde): rin po che mang po dang / gser gyis yongs su gang ba'o// de dag las gter chen po gcig ni khyim gyi bu smad dang / bran po dang bran mo dang / las gyid pa rnams
339a5(mdo sde): la stsal to// gter chen po gcig ni dbul po slongs pa thams cad la stsal to// gter chen po gcig ni dge slong phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i phyogs bzhi'i dge
339a6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun la dbul lo// gter chen po gcig ni sangs rgyas la stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la dbul lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang ba
339a7(mdo sde): gyur te/ de'i ba ma mchis/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu ste/ snyen par rdzogs
339a8(mdo sde): shing dge slong gyi tshul thob par bgyir gsol// dge snyen dpal sras legs par bshad pa chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen pa rdzogs nas dge
339b1(mdo sde): slong gyi tshul thob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
339b2(mdo sde): ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ bskal pa bgrangs ma mchis pa bye bar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas 'khor de nas
339b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu langs nas de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu tshig su
339b4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'od dag gsol to// bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni// mya ngan 'das smad bdag cag rnams/ lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste// dam pa'i chos ni
339b5(mdo sde): gzung spro// rnyed dang bkur sti spangs na su// sten pa kun kyang rab tu spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes bstan pa'i// chos 'di rjes su mi gtong ngo // dam pa'i
339b6(mdo sde): chos na 'di slad du// gshe dang mi snyen mi mchi ba dang // ngan du smra ba'i tshig rnams kyang // bzod pas de dag dang du blang nga tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su cho 'dri ba dang
339b7(mdo sde): sdigs pa dang // mi sngags pa dang ma snyan pa// de dag thams cad bzod par bgyi// dmigs pa dag la rab ta gnas pa/ bdad kyi pho nya bdud kyi tshogs/ dam
339b8(mdo sde): ba'i chos la skar 'debs pa'i// dge slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshul khrims 'tshal pa sdig chos can/ khyim pa dang ni sten cing gnas/ bkur sti
340a1(mdo sde): ngag dang rnyed la rkam// chos 'di 'chol bar mi bgyid do// 'jig rten rkyang ban rnams dang 'dren/ bdag la rab tu ston bgyid cing / rab
340a2(mdo sde): tu nges pa rnams la smod// mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag 'byung dgon gnas ni spangs nas su// rtag tu 'du 'dzi rnams la dga'/ 'jig rten gsang tshig rnams la brtson
340a3(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas/ mi mkhas pa dag dge 'dun las zhal ta byed pa rtag tu brtson/ bsam gtan bsam gtan byed spangs te/ dkon mchog gsum
340a4(mdo sde): dang dri mi bgyid/ thos dang tshul khrims kyis ma lags kyi// tshogs kyi nang nas rnyed la tshol// sbyin pa bdag la phyir sbyin brtson rtog pa bcangs shing mya ngan bcas
340a5(mdo sde): nga yir 'du shes bzung nas su/ mdza' dang slong ster khyim la dga'/ de dag der ni rab 'jug cing / 'jig rten pa'i gtam rnams bgyid/ zhing gi don dang khyim gyi
340a6(mdo sde): don/ de dag nyo tshong bgyid la gnas/ thong shol shal ba rnams ldan zhing // bdag cag dge sbyong yin zhes 'dzer// dmigs pa yis ni rab tu bgyid// lta ba tha dad
340a7(mdo sde): kun tu gnas// stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas/ de dag g.yang sa bzhin du 'gyur// 'ji rten pha rol mi dpyod cing // las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dor// rdzun du smra
340a8(mdo sde): deng rab tu ldan// chos ma lags la chos su 'dzin// dge slong rgyal po rab 'azhug cing / de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa/ rnam par 'jig che sems can byer/
340b1(mdo sde): bdag cag dam chos gzung bar bgyi// mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du/ 'thun par dpyod par mi bgyid de// rang rang gi ni spu rnams la/ de dag rtag tu mos par bgyid/ mdo
340b2(mdo sde): sde gang dag rab zab cing // rnam grol 'bras bur ldan pa rnams// rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de// de dag sna tshogs gtan rnams bgyid // 'di 'dra ba'i dus 'di na//
340b3(mdo sde): don bcas tshig 'bru ldan pa'i// legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni// rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// de'i tshe na sems can yang // rab tu rnam par 'jig
340b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur// rgyal po'i las kyis bsdigs pas na// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur// 'jug dus rab tu mi 'azad pa// sdig pa'i dus ni 'dra ba'i//
340b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// chos 'di dag cag gzung bar bgyi/ tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su// gang dag chos la mi gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la
340b6(mdo sde): byams par bgyi// de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi/ sems can rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa// tshul khrims 'tshal pa mthong nas su// de'i 'gro ba cing 'gyur zhes// mchi ma
340b7(mdo sde): 'am rab tu byung bar bgyi// dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa// de dag 'phral thug mthong na yang // de dag gshe bar mi 'gyur bar// ring nas byams pa btsal bar
340b8(mdo sde): bgyi// rab tu bsnams nas ngag gi las// nyams kyis ci nus srung bar bgyi// sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa// de la blo bur gtam mi bgyi/ nor sprin de bzhin
341a1(mdo sde): sti stang gis// mi rnams yongs su smin bgyi nas yang dag sdig med spyang yul gyis// slad kyis de dag bskal par bgyi// khyim dang steng
341a2(mdo sde): pa kun spangs te/ don nyung ba dang / bgyid nyung ba/ bas mtha' dgon pa'i spyod yul ba// ri dgas bzhin du 'gyur bar gyi/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang / spangs
341a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims gnas pa dang / mnyam bzhag shes rab ldan pa po dang / g.yel ba ma mchis bgyi bar bgyi// dul ba dang ni zhi ba dang / grol bas gol du zhugs nas kyang /
341a4(mdo sde): sems can dag ni rlol ba/ de la bdag cag chos ston to// chos 'dod par ni rtogs nas su// shin tu ring du'ang mchi bar bgyi// chos la dga' zhing mos rnyed nas/
341a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi don yang bgyi// sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po// de dag mngon par mthong nas kyang // chos dang nges par rab gnas nas/ bdag la
341a6(mdo sde): rab tu brtag par bgyi// sti snying bgyis dang ma bgyis la/ ri rab lta bur gyur nas su/ 'jig rten gyis ni mi gos pa/ 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar bgyi//
341a7(mdo sde): dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyi/ mi snyan pa dag rtogs nas kyang / las ni bdag gir bya bar bgyi/ de dag las ni smin pa 'gyur// chos rnams la ni gnas
341a8(mdo sde): nged la de 'dra chos rnams ni/ ji lta bur yang yong med ces/ bshed ma dag kyang 'gyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste/ dge sbyong yon tan med do/
341b1(mdo sde): zhes// yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang // mdo sde 'di spong bar 'gyur// sna dang rna chad de dag ni// me long dga' bar mi 'gyur ltar// yang dag bskal ba thos pa dang
341b2(mdo sde): de dag dam chos spong bar 'gyur// dge slong gang dag dam pa'i chos/ rab tu 'dzin pa 'byung 'gyur te// de dag bzhin du tshul 'chos kyang / gang yang chos 'di mi nyan
341b3(mdo sde): to// rgyal po rnams kyang sla bar bgyid/ skye bo chen po byed 'gyur yang / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis/ sems can de dag chos nyan 'gyur/ dus ngan de tshe bdag
341b4(mdo sde): cag rnams// sems can dag la phan slad du// lus dang srog kyang rab gtang ste// dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus de ni/ tshig tsam du
341b5(mdo sde): ni ma lags kyi/ smra ba'i snying por bgyid par yang / mgon pos bdag bla sam pa mkhyen/ dam pa'i chos ni yongasu bzung na// bsod nams tshogs ni ci tsam mchis/
341b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad la zhu// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa// rigs
341b7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shar phyogs kyi stong gsum bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang rdul phra rab kyi tsher rdul phra rab kyi rdul shig la/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang
341b8(mdo sde): byang drung steng dung 'og dang / phyogs bcu kun tu snying su bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul shig/ de nas dul phra rab de dag thams cad rdzi
342a1(mdo sde): snyed par// shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de skad 'das shing / rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig la tshul de lta bur shar phyogasu rdul phra rab de dag
342a2(mdo sde): thams cad zad zad du bzhag kyang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi mthar thug pa gang yang med do// shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs
342a3(mdo sde): re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi rdul phra rab rnams tshul de lta bu phyogs bcur
342a4(mdo sde): bzhag pa la tshad dam mtha' rtogs par nus sam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so// gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags
342a5(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' bas/ mkhyen pa ni ma brtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag las/ gang du rdul phra
342a6(mdo sde): rab de dag gzhag par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur te// rtsig pas skor nas/ 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/
342a7(mdo sde): srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi grong khyer de dag gi yungs 'bru mi bcug pa 'ab shig gis// yongs gang bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ yungs 'bru de dag
342a8(mdo sde): mang ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pas// ji ltar dpe' btsal ba 'ango mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das gang dpe 'di thos nas/ dang par 'gyur
342b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can de dag kyang // ngo mtshar mang du byung ba ma chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni sungs 'bru
342b2(mdo sde): de dag rgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am// stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am// brgya sgong phrag 'di snyed gcig ce 'am// dkrigs pa dang // brtsams pa dang / khyed phyin pa dang / mi 'khrugs
342b3(mdo sde): pa khrag 'di snyed cig ce'am// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snyed cig ce 'am// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed
342b4(mdo sde): cig ce 'am// sangs rgyas kyi brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes rab tu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu byang chub 'dod la la zhig gis// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed cig/
342b5(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste// sbyin pa byin pa bas// ji ltar skyes bu dam pa// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa// gang yon tan gyi mchog 'di lta bu la
342b6(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i yongs su bzung na 'di de bas chos bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de skad
342b7(mdo sde): du// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lal zhig gis ste stang du byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mor byas te gang mchod pas/ gang zab pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de/
342b8(mdo sde): ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru ji snyed pa/ de snyed kyi rten pa med pa'i mchod sbyin pas/ gang gzhan zhig sems can thams cad la kheng
343a1(mdo sde): khro ba med pa'i sems kyis la rab tu dga' zhing bzod pas gom pa bdun por na de bas de bsod nams ches mang du skyed// yungs 'bru de dag
343a2(mdo sde): ji snyed du/ brgya byin dpa tshangs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa bas gzhan gang gis 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa
343a3(mdo sde): dang // sdug bsngal bar rigs cing chos thams cad la bdag med rig la/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba rig nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed de dkon
343a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du
343a5(mdo sde): skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad dus na ci nas chos
343a6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod cing / rgyas par yang 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rlab du gsol// bcom ldan
343a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig bshad pa ste/ dgug pa'i tshig de dag gis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs
343a8(mdo sde): nas/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di yun no ring du gnas par bya ba dang / rgya cher rnam par de zhing rab tu snyan pa'i phyir rtson par 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag dgun
343b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig go// 'di lta ste/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hi d+hi re/ d+ha dza pa ti/ d+ha dzA lang kA re a brta ni/ sha me sha ma pa ti/ shA na ti/ mu khA ni gra ha pa ra pa r-i ga kra/ a no ra bi ga ma sa
343b2(mdo sde): ma pa thA shud d+hi/ pa thA nu gam/ pa thA sa na d+hi/ phrad nya mu ge/ ar+ya ku ru le/ bu'u ta ra kle/ a me sa tsa/ me ne sa tsa/ ta ta ma sarba/ b+had d+ha pa da/ d+harma nu san d+hi/
343b3(mdo sde): ar+ya Na nu ga mi ni/ a nar+ya nir g+ha ta ni/ ru b+ha ba sa ti ni/ I sha ra pa da/ lo ga tsi ta tri kr-i ti/ a nu ra shrA ya na na du/ i mA na d+ha ma sa ni d+hi b+hi dza na du ni/ r+ya ka ti ni
343b4(mdo sde): de de shaM pra ti ra shan tu d+ha maM d+ha ra ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'gug pa'i tshig go/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jigs shing skrag ste/ spu zing
343b5(mdo sde): zhes byed na/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
343b6(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrang ba dang / skyab pa dang / swa dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang //
343b7(mdo sde): rjes su gzung ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sprod pa der/ sta dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
343b8(mdo sde): ka lding dang / myi 'am ci gang dag chos ma lags pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag shin tu tshad gtsad par bgyi'o// gang dag chos 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag
344a1(mdo sde): gi sems rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu legs par gzhag par bgyi'o// cho ga gi 'tshams su
344a2(mdo sde): tshig mtshams sbar bar bgyi'o// spobs pa yang skul bar bgyi'o// dran pa dang / glo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / dga' ba dang / 'phel bgyi'o// de skad ces
344a3(mdo sde): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grog po dag 'di lta ste/ khyed ni nga'i bu chos las chos kyi byung ba ste/ khyed rnam
344a4(mdo sde): nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir spro ba ston pa ni legs so legs so// khyed rnams chos kyi rgyun 'thun pa 'dis/ 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ 'jig
344a5(mdo sde): rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'phags pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbying su yongasu mya ngan las 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
344a6(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam ka mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu rig
344a7(mdo sde): pa'i gsung sngags kyi tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di lta
344a8(mdo sde): ste// shu b+he shu b+ha ma/ ti shud+ha byA'u he dad re/ da ri de tu ra/ Ned ma sha me u pa sha me khu me/ u ga khu bo a so mu khye d+ha ra ni/ a rang de/ shu shu'u shes
344b1(mdo sde): \u0f7f/ ar+thaH/ b+h+yaH/ san ngas me/ bam pa ti/ sa par shi/ a sherba d+ha/ 9he/ khu ru khu re a na ti gra me/ de bar ka sa/ hi te ma hA pa/ rgyas bra nes/
344b2(mdo sde): du/ shasha kr-i de d+han byin tra/ da sha sha ta na ya na par ma ku te d+ha ra/ mi go rom ma rung tha ban ni// b+ha si/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni/ lha'i da ba pashAN+Da byin dgug pa'i tshig
344b3(mdo sde): ste/ dgug pa'i tshig gang gis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bkus nas/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po
344b4(mdo sde): brgya byin chos kyi shugs kyis dga' ba skyes na sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par bya ste/ g.yog lha brgya stong mang po dang / bcom
344b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas/ lhag te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
344b6(mdo sde): 'das bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha la dbang bgyid de/ g.yog lha'i tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling rgyas par
344b7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// chos smra ba de dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'tshang ba de dag la ji ltar mi gnas pa dang / rna ba dang mchog tu rna ba dang / mos pa rnyed cig
344b8(mdo sde): chos kyi rnams grang 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal ba'i pho brang du zhugs nas rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyi
345a1(mdo sde): srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos nyan pa'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag gi gan du mchis par bgyin/
345a2(mdo sde): khro zhing gshe yang dang du blang bar bgyi'o// bdud bar chad bgyid pa'i gnod pa thams cad las kyang srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
345a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod ci lta bur lha'i dbang po thob pas chos kyi dbang por zhugs nasang dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir seng
345a4(mdo sde): ge'i sgra sgrogs pa leg so// legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung
345a5(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu ba yin no// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' nam kra mdzod la bka' stsal
345a6(mdo sde): pa/ de la rigs kyi bu mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig bshad kyis dgug pa'i tshig gang dag gis/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po// chos kyi rnam
345a7(mdo sde): grangs 'di srung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba nyon cig/ de la dgug pa'i tshig rnams 'di lta ste/ mai tI/ shu b+ha me'i tri/ d+ha ra ma mA'i tri/ mAM d+ha nu sa hi ShI/ sa na d+hi mai traM/
345a8(mdo sde): sa du gas kyi/ mdu pa wis ma \u0f7f/ d+hi k+Sha tra~M wi a du zang pom a 'i \u0f89\u0fa4 Ni/ yo waM/ yul pa// kan me / se sog ma d+he
345a9(mdo sde): sa mi phyi ra
345b1(mdo sde): d+ha nu ga man mai tri/ bu d+ha aH/ Sh+TA na mai tri/ a nu rag/ zha mi tri/ d+ha ra ma pra ti sa ra Na mai tri/ mo wa po tri/ a na nu ro d+ha mi tre/ tham+b+ha pa ta/ b+hU tri/ d+ha na lang kar me
345b2(mdo sde): trita s+ya a nu sa d+hi ku rur/ me tri tri a nu san d+ha u be/ krA mai tri/ ba mA ba da a nu ka man me tri/ tsid ta o 'ung tsi li l+ya mai tri/ a nu sa ra Na mai tri/ ni sti me tri/ sarba
345b3(mdo sde): tra nu ga man me tri/ a kang tsha du/ pra ma na ud sid dz+nyA d+ha na su kha na/ bud ti b+ha/ swa sa mA d+he/ ni skam ma ha pa ma nad/ bya ba lo ka ya/ dzam bu dri pan/ ku ru shwa d+ha rarma ra k+ka na
345b4(mdo sde): ma ti kra ma bu d+ha/ ShA na na/ nam mkha' mdzod 'di dag ni mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig go// de nas mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshang pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
345b5(mdo sde): na 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs pa'i rig pa'i sngags byas pa'i tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos te/ thos nas tshangs
345b6(mdo sde): pa brgya stong phrag drug cu brgyad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
345b7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug ga phyogs gcig tu 'jug nas/ mi jed kyi bdan bcangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ma'ang skad ces gsam ka/ mamam ldan 'das 'das cas de
345b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pan byin gyis rlabs pas/ bdag byams pa dang / snying rje ldan te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi'o// gang chos u ba de ngan
346a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud cing / mdo sde 'di dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris te/ 'chang ba de dag
346a2(mdo sde): dgon par mchis sam/ grong dang / grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du ma mchis sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mchis kyang / dung / chos kyi gtam bgyid
346a3(mdo sde): kyang rung ste/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di/ rgya cher 'chang na rtsa bar bgyi'o// srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de dag de dag la spro ba bstsal bar bgyi'o// stom
346a4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// dran pa sgrub par bgyi'o// blo glos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o// spobs pa skrag par bgyi'o//
346a5(mdo sde): ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi'o// dad pa rnams sgul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bdag cag gis yongs su gzung ste/
346a6(mdo sde): rgya cher 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs legs/
346a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rjes su yi rang ngo // ji ltar ngas da ltar skor ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa khyod kyang ring por ma
346a8(mdo sde): thags par chos kyi 'char la rab tu sbar bar 'gyuraro// jithar khyod kyis daltar ba'i dam pa ma chos yongasu gzung ba de bzhin du tshangs su gzhan dag kyang khyod tsang ba
346b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa byams pa la ji tsam du bzung ba dang
346b2(mdo sde): bcang ba dang / klag pa dang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa bzo zhing byas pa shes pa skyed pa dang /
346b3(mdo sde): bdag bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thob par
346b4(mdo sde): bya ba dang / bdud thams cad tshar bcod pa dang / mu stegs can thams cad gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs
346b5(mdo sde): mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir skal pa bye ba phrag grangs med par yang dag par sgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do// de skad
346b6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya
346b7(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di srung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag dang / 'das
346b8(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag dga' ldan gnas na
347a1(mdo sde): mchis te/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde dag kun tu srung ba dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i sadu nan tan du
347a2(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rnams su'i rna bar grag par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
347a3(mdo sde): dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cing / bdag nyid kyang sbyor bar bgyid pa de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i
347a4(mdo sde): byin gyis rlabs su rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe/ bdud kyi phyogs kyang g.yos par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis bdagi spu'i khong bu
347a5(mdo sde): re re grub pa de la stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur kyang / de dag gi spu'i khung bu gcig gis
347a6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'chi ba nas dpe'i bar du yang nye mi 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye
347a7(mdo sde): shes kyi stobs kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu pham par bgyis la/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang
347a8(mdo sde): chub 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa leg so leg so// byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las te/ bzhi gang
347b1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas zil kyis gnan pa dang / sems can
347b2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba ste/ byams pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las so// bzhi po de dag kyang las gcig
347b3(mdo sde): gis yongs su bsdus so// gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ da mi rlos la yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rten 'od srung chen po dang / che dang
347b4(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dka' ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung dang kun dga' bo ji tsam du gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / gzhan dag kyang rgya cher yang dag par rab
347b5(mdo sde): tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gtad do// 'od srung chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi mthu
347b6(mdo sde): dang / stobs dang / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
347b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grang 'di dag gi bzung lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis bdag gis yangs shing rgyas par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
347b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di
348a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pas// gsungs pa zab mo zab mor snang ba rgyun chad pa/ nges pa'i don mthong ba dga' ba/ rtogs par dka'
348a2(mdo sde): ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis rgyas pa dran pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / nges par rtog pa dang / yid rang ba dag par byed pa shes rab kyi snang
348a3(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ rnam par byed pa/ rnam par grol ba nges par ston pa/ zhi ba ma gos pa mkhas shing rtogs pa rnams kyis rig par bya ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis stong
348a4(mdo sde): cing sngags pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po phyag rgyas btab pa/ thogs pa med pa'i slob pa 'dzin pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / mos pa rnams 'phel
348a5(mdo sde): ba/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams bcom pa phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil kyis mi rnon pa/ tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams spa gong ba/ spang ba'i yon tan sbyangs pa
348a6(mdo sde): dang / sdom pa dang sdom pa tshar byin pa rtong pa'i yon tan gyi chos la rab tu gnas pa/ yon tan gyi chos mtha yas pa las nges par byung ba sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi chos
348a7(mdo sde): dang ye shes 'di 'dzin tam/ len tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu stan te/ yi ger 'gri ba 'am/ yi ger
348a8(mdo sde): 'drir 'jug gam tshig tu don tam/ sems sapa rtog gam/ tshul bzhin nges par sems sam/ nan tan la gnas pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/
348b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slar byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis rgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// phyogs bcu rgya chen dpag tu med pa ni/
348b2(mdo sde): zhing rnams sangs rgyas spyan gyis gang gzigs pa// de dag thams cad rin chen rab bkang ste// byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin pa bas// gang gis sangs rgyas
348b3(mdo sde): mang pos bshad pa'i// mdo sde 'di 'dra bar bzang ma gos pa/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam gzhan la sten byed pa/ de'i bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/ me tog dri
348b4(mdo sde): zhim byug pa gdugs rnams dang / ba dan rgyal mtshan lnga ldigs rnams kyis/ zhing de thams cad yongs su gang byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mchod
348b5(mdo sde): ba bas/ bde gshegs bstan pa dam chos rab 'jig cing / 'gag pa'i che na gang zhig bag yod par dam pa'i yo su 'dzin byed pa// de'i bsod nams de ni ches
348b6(mdo sde): mchog/ phyogs bcu dag na rgya mtsho gang yod pa/ de dag 'bru mar dri zhim par bkang ste/ snying po ri rab tshad tsam byas nas su/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten me mar bus pa
348b7(mdo sde): bas// gang gis chos sgron 'di ni rab 'jig che// 'jig rten 'di dag mun pas bsgribs shes na/ rgyal bas gsung ba'i chos sgron 'dzin byed pa// de'i bsod nams
348b8(mdo sde): de ni ches mchog go// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub mchog tshol zhing // zhing rnams bye mar 'dren pa gang mthong ba// de dag la ni bskal pa bye mar du/ lha rdzas 'du
349a1(mdo sde): shes yid 'ong mchod pa bas// gang zhig sangs rgyas byas pa bzo ba dang // dkon mchog gsum ni rjesu gzung ba dang // chos 'di la ni sems can
349a2(mdo sde): gzung ba'i phyir// dam chos 'dzin pa de ni chos mchog go// ji ltar mgon po rnams kyi chos 'dzin ltar// sems can gang ngas sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs// de
349a3(mdo sde): dag gang gis brgya byin tshangs par bkod// de'i bsod nams de snyed mi 'phel lo// de'i bsod nams de sems can de kun dgra bcom bkod pa dang // rang rgyal theg
349a4(mdo sde): par rab tu bkod pa bas// gang zhig byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// dam chos 'dzin pa de ni khyad par 'phags// gal te bsod nams de la gzugs yod
349a5(mdo sde): na// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtogs par// bsod nams de'i bsnod ni yod ma yin// ji ltar skal pa
349a6(mdo sde): bye ba stong brjod kyang // sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin ltar// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa yis// bsod nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no//
349a7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas// bcom ldan 'das las dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i// bsod nams 'di bshad pa thos nas// tsham
349a8(mdo sde): zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
349b1(mdo sde): gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson par mi bgyid pa de dag ni/ bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag dam pa'i chos yod
349b2(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan thams cad ni bdag la yungs 'bru tsam du 'anga'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni phyogs bcu'i rnams
349b3(mdo sde): mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du bdag 'du shes gnas par 'gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag sems can thams cad la 'tshal ba'i slad du lus dang srog kyang bor
349b4(mdo sde): to// bde ba thams cad mi 'chal bar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du ge cha 'go bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
349b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod kyis bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad
349b6(mdo sde): dang // blo mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char mngon par rab tu phab
349b7(mdo sde): go// bar snang las kyang sgra 'di skad ces/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis bsdus pa'i le'u 'di rgyan te/ yongs su bzung ba'i bar du
349b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byaso// byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grang 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du dam pa'i chos brgyan
350a1(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od rab tu btang bas 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
350a2(mdo sde): cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i thog ma dang bar ma dang tha ma bshad pa na/ sems dpag tu med grangs med pa ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed//
350a3(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med pa dag ni bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can la la dag ni sems rnam par grol lo// la la dag ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag
350a4(mdo sde): go/ la la ngag ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid do// la la nag ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongasu bzung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag la yang blta ba'i
350a5(mdo sde): phyir rgyu bsags par yang gyur to// de dag thams cad la yang bcom ldan 'das rjesu thugs ra ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa nas/ byang chub sems
350a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
350a7(mdo sde): dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong ba dang /
350a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ang srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
350b1(mdo sde): bo tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a'o
350b2(mdo sde): de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
350b3(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i le'u las/ 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho//
350b4(mdo sde): rgya gar gi mkhan po ba tsi ya shi la dang / shi len tra pe de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtam
350b5(mdo sde): la phab pa// / @/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya pi shwe sha tsan ti pra m+ba pra ri phrin tsa na na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshangs pa
350b6(mdo sde): khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po'o// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
350b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan d+ha ka gnas pa'i 'o min 'tshal na/ dge slong stong phrag drug cu rtsa
350b8(mdo sde): bzhi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang mngon par shes
351a1(mdo sde): pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting 'dzi zab pa/ zangan par shes pas rnam par ram cing chungs
351a2(mdo sde): ba mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa la mkhas pa/ mi skye ba'i ches la bzod pa thob rnams 'di lta ste/ gzhonur gyur pa 'jam dpal dang /
351a3(mdo sde): gzhonur gyur pa lag na rin po che dang / gzhonur gyur pa lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / gzhon nur gyur pa rin pa che dpal dang / gzho nur gyur pa nam mkha' mdzod dang / gzhon
351a4(mdo sde): nur gyur pa sems skyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gzhonar gyur pa'i dra ba can gyi 'od dang / gzhon nur gyur pa rnams par bsgyings pa dang / gzhon nur gyur
351a5(mdo sde): pa dpal gyi snying po dang / gzho nur gyur pa bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / gzhon nur gyur pa pad ma bkod pa dang / gzho nur gyur pa seng ge dang / gzhon
351a6(mdo sde): nur gyur pa tha lang dang / gzhon nur gyur pa zla 'od dang / gzhon nur gyur pa zla ba'i zer gyi 'od dang / gzhon nur gyur pa blo gros mchog dang / gzhon nur gyur pa rgyan thams cad
351a7(mdo sde): dgod pa dang / bza skyong la stsogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug la 'di lta ste/ bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon mchog dang / mis min dang /
351a8(mdo sde): phug sbas dang / chus byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / bla ma'i blo gos dang / khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / mthong ba don yod dang // shin tu yang
351b1(mdo sde): dag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / rtson pa mi mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / sa 'dzin dang / de lta bu la stsogs pa
351b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po lnga la stsogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dgal
351b3(mdo sde): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa la stsogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha brgya stong dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gzi brjid che ba/ gzi
351b4(mdo sde): brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang yang thabs
351b5(mdo sde): gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du ba dar nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'o gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can gyi 'ang
351b6(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa pa gcig tu gzar ste/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ stong gsum gyi stong
351b7(mdo sde): chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu mos byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gyi sems can thams cad la bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
351b8(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
352a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa pa sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' shig zhus// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
352a2(mdo sde): dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dra ba can gyi 'od khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid du lung stan
352a3(mdo sde): bas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'od skad ces gsol to//
352a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni lta bas chog mi shes pa kha dog nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pas lhag pa rnams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang de bzhin gshegs
352a5(mdo sde): pa'i sku blta ba 'am brtag par nus pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to snyams bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba 'am/ rtog pa de dag thams
352a6(mdo sde): cang ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dra ba can gyi 'od ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs
352a7(mdo sde): ma bye bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba dang / rtag par mi gnus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par bkod pa zhes
352a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'od zer yod do// 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang lta bzhin rtog pa de dag gi mig gi dbang po yang nyams par mi 'gyuraro//
352b1(mdo sde): dran+dan gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la/ mi 'jigs pa'i spong ba zhes bya ba'i tshad zer yod de/ 'od zer des rigs pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'dri zhing byir
352b2(mdo sde): 'dri bar yang byed do// dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba stsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/ 'od zer des reg pa'i sems cad rnams 'khor los
352b3(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i srid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'od zer dge ba'i rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des
352b4(mdo sde): rig pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin thob par bya'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o// 'od zer bdag po thob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems
352b5(mdo sde): can rnams tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya bar phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o// 'od zer nyon mongs pa med par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa
352b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa kun 'dri'o// 'od zer rtse gcig pa dben pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams
352b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa kun 'dra'o// 'od gzer thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su dbang skur pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des rigs
352b8(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi theg pa kur 'dri'o// 'od zer khyad par du 'gro zhes bya ba'i 'od zer nges/ de bzhin
353a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis sems can gang la reg pa de dag 'chi thos ma thag tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
353a2(mdo sde): rten du skye'o// rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa grong du gshegs pa na byin te/ der de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od des/ sems can su
353a3(mdo sde): dag la reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad bkod pa yang grong khyer der 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rnam par 'thor bya zhes
353a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' mu med pa rab tu g.yos par byed do// bde ba ston pa zhes bya'i 'od zer des ni sems
353a5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dam la sdug bsngal med par byed do// 'od zer byams pas 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i des ni byol sod kyi skyes
353a6(mdo sde): gnas su song ba'i sems can rnams gcig la gcig za ba med par byed do// 'od zer rab tu sim par byed pa zhes bya ba des ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems
353a7(mdo sde): can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal med par byed de// dri ma med pa zhes bya'i 'od zer des ni sems can ma dongs pa rnams mig thob par 'gyuraro//
353a8(mdo sde): rna ba'i rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i 'ad per nges ni/ sems can 'on pa rnams rna bathobo bar 'gyuraro// rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i tshong bar des ni mi dge
353b1(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa rnams dge ba'i bcu'i lam thob par 'gyuraro// ngo tsha shes pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can mos pa rnams dran pa
353b2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyuraro// med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can log par lta ba can rnams yang dag par lta ba theb par 'gyuraro// rab tu gtong ba
353b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can ser sna can rnams matong ba theb par 'gyuraro// yongasu gtung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des na/ sems can ngan pa'i
353b4(mdo sde): ngang tshul can rnams tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro// phan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can gnod par sems dpa' rnams bzod pa dang
353b5(mdo sde): des thob par 'gyuraro// 'bar ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can le lo can rnams brtson 'grus thob par 'gyuraro// rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
353b6(mdo sde): des ni/ sems can rna ba nyams pa rnams bsam gtan thob par 'gyuraro// ye shes shes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can 'chal ba'i shes rab can rnams shes
353b7(mdo sde): rab thob par 'gyur ro// rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can ma dang pa rnams dad pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni
353b8(mdo sde): sems can thos pa nyang ba rnams thos pa thob par 'gyur ro// spod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can ngo tsha ba dang mdzom pa med pa'i rnams/
354a1(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa thob par 'gyuraro// skyo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod chags
354a2(mdo sde): 'dzem par 'gyur// dga' ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer de ni/ sems can zhe sdang spyod pa rnams zhe sdang 'joms par 'gyur ro// snang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/
354a3(mdo sde): sems can gti mug smod pa rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba khong du chud por 'gyur ro// kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can cha mnyam par spyod
354a4(mdo sde): pa rnams cha mnyam pa sbed pa spong bar 'gyuraro// dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la/ gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/ 'od zer des
354a5(mdo sde): reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma kha dog brgya stong du mas lhag par mthong bar 'gyuraro// dra ba can gyi 'od ngas
354a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la brtsams te/ bskal ba 'am/ skal pa las lhag par bshad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'od zer gyi rnam pa dang ldan
354a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos bstan pa yongasu zad par mi 'gyur te// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ 'od zer gyi yon tan mtha'
354a8(mdo sde): yas mu med pa dang ldan pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol pa da
354b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i bkod pa tshad ma mchis bstan pa 'di dang / thabs mkha' ba bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa ngo ma
354b2(mdo sde): te// bcom ldan 'das 'od zer 'di dag ni bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong ste/ ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don bdag 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
354b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' la la 'od zer 'di dag gi ming thos nas dad pa rnyed par gyur pa de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer 'di lta bu'i rab tu snang
354b4(mdo sde): bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams skul ma thag
354b5(mdo sde): tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' su dag pa dri dang lung ston pa dang / bshad pa la mthar phyin pa rnam
354b6(mdo sde): mchis nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la kun zhu zhing brnyen bkur gyid pa dang / slar zhu bar 'gyur ba'i 'od zer/ byang chub sems dpa' skul ba zhes bgyib gtang du
354b7(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe// 'od gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa ston par 'gyur ba'i 'od zer de lta bu sa las phyung ste/ byang
354b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams 'od des bskal ma thag tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin par 'gyuraro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs
355a1(mdo sde): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag gang gi'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ba snyed 'das pa na/ yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
355a2(mdo sde): pad de/ de nas zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhes bzhes te/ byang chub sem
355a3(mdo sde): dpa' 'ba' shig la chos kyang 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa khyad par sems shes bya ba'i de
355a4(mdo sde): 'od des bskul ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ga la der song ste/ phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs pa mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
355a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du snang ba chen po 'di byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des
355a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs na sengs kyi zhing brgya stong phrag gang gi'i klung bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma 'das
355a7(mdo sde): pa na/ mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
355a8(mdo sde): da ltar na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus
355b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ sku las 'ong 'di gta ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa de bdag
355b2(mdo sde): gzigs par bzhed na/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der/ bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pa de lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / kun ba zhu ba
355b3(mdo sde): dang / slar zhu ba'i slad du bdag mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa da ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang
355b4(mdo sde): po yang phyin kyis/ de'i dus la dbeb par shes na khyod song shig/ tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing der lhags pa'i bsam bcu rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ snyan
355b5(mdo sde): par smra ba dang / ngan de smra ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / snyan pa thos pa dang / mi snyan pa thos pa la byams pa'i sems dang / dus thams cad du sems can du
355b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma rnams la yang dag par spor ba dang / ri mo byed pa dang / bsdus pa byed pa rnams la sems mnyam
355b7(mdo sde): ba dang / gzhan gyi ltung ba'i khrul pa thams cad la nyes par mi lta ba dang / theg pa sna tshogs la ro gcig dang / ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyi sgras mi skrag pa dang / byang
355b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thas cad la ston par 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la/ ngo mtshar du 'du shes pa ste/ tshangs pa
356a1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa bcu po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi shing der gnas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyang bar sems kyis 'di skad ces nanas
356a2(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag seng ge'i sgra mi sgrogs te/ 'on kyang bdag gi spyod pa gang lags pa'i spyod pa 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das nyid mngon sum du
356a3(mdo sde): gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa de dag kyang rnam par spang zhing mnyam par gzhag pa'i bre brag kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas
356a4(mdo sde): par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pazla 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la
356a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems can ma rungs pa'i rnams tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag cag ma skyes pa ni snyed pa legs par rnyed
356a6(mdo sde): do/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams de skad ma mdza cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni
356a7(mdo sde): gag sbas pa brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bas/ mi brjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang snga gros dus gcig sems zhe sdang med par gnas pa de bas 'di
356a8(mdo sde): sa sus na tso kyi shen/ 'di kyi sa dzes sa du ku nas na mangs pa phur bcoM/ sephes can de dag kyang debal du rgya bamang shing /
356b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa mang ba yin no// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis tshangs pa khyad par sems dang lhan cig tu chis te/ tshangs
356b2(mdo sde): pabadag cag kyang mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi'o// bsam pa 'di dag kyang rnam par spya // bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la yang lta'o// phyag bgyi'o// snyen
356b3(mdo sde): bkur bgyi'o// mnyam par gzhag pa'i bye brag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas par bgyi'o// de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcwa
356b4(mdo sde): gnyis dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bkum pa las rkyang
356b5(mdo sde): ba'am/ rkyang ba las bkum pa'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig de tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa
356b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la bka' stsal pa/
356b7(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi 'od khyod kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dra ba can gyi 'ong
356b8(mdo sde): tshangs pa khyad par sems 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin 'dri ba kun 'dri ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/ tshig gzung ba rnams kyi nang na
357a1(mdo sde): mchog go// tshig btsun pa rnams kyi nang na mchog/ tshig 'jam po rnams kyi nang na mchog go// gsod par smra ba rnam kyi nang na mchog go// tshig
357a2(mdo sde): mchod pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go// tshig thogs pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go// ldem po ngag tu smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog go// sems khong khro ba med pa'i nang na mchog
357a3(mdo sde): go// byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/ snying rje la gnas pa rnams kyi ning mchog go// dga' ba la gnas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go/ btang snyoms la
357a4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go// byang chub sems dpa' the tsom thams cad gcod pa dang / kun 'dri ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi nang na mchog go// de nas tshangs pa
357a5(mdo sde): khyad par sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis po de dag lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la bla der phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mdo wa
357a6(mdo sde): byin 'am sa sa sum bskur ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de sogs su thas mo sbyor ba btud nis bamam ldan 'das ma tsho su bcad ba dag gi
357a7(mdo sde): myed do/ gas sa /
357a8(mdo sde): me sa dzinas ma sa
357b1(mdo sde): ba'i zhing rnams de dag rnam spangs nas/ khyod kyi thugs rjes ngan pa yongs su gzung // 'jig rten mgon khyod ye shes ngam mchis/ kha lus bde bar gshegs dang khyod du
357b2(mdo sde): mtshungs// shin tu rnam par bsam pa sngon mdzad pa// 'di 'dra ba'i zhing 'di khyed kyis zung // tshul khrims thams cad rnam par 'dod spang nas// gang
357b3(mdo sde): zhing bskal par gzhan na spyod pa bas// su dag byams pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'dir/ skad cig spyad pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags/ lus dang ngag dang 'on te
357b4(mdo sde): yid kyis kyi/ gang la nyes bgyis rnam par gsum mchis te// ngan song gsum du mong bar gong 'gyur ba// de ni tshe 'di nyid la 'byang bar 'gyur// byang
357b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di na gang mchis pa// de dag rtag tu gdung bar bgyi ste// de las gag log ltung mchis pa 'ang / de dag 'dir na glad pa na bas 'byung //
357b6(mdo sde): 'di na byang chub sems dpa' skyon med ga ga/ dam pa'i chos srung chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams// de dag 'di las phyin cad nam du yang // dran pa mi 'khrug
357b7(mdo sde): blo yang nyams mi 'gyur/ gang zhig bdud kyi phyogs pa bcad dang // de bzhin nyon mongs las bcas sbyong 'tshal ba// de ni zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos nyid
357b8(mdo sde): grub// 'di la ye shes ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// gang zhing bskal pa bye bar zhing gzhan du// sems ldan dam chos 'dzin par 'gyur pa bas//
358a1(mdo sde): sdug
358a2(mdo sde): su dag snga dro gcig tsam mi mched du// 'di ni de bas mchog tu mkhas par dgongs// bdag gis mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten dang // de
358a3(mdo sde): bzhin tshe dpag med kyi bde can mthong // de nas bsdug bsngal sgra ma mchis// der ni yon tan bgyi ba rmad mi che// nyon mongs 'byung gnas 'jig rten zhes gang
358a4(mdo sde): 'dir// zhe sdang can gyis rab tu nyes bzod la// chos 'di la yang gzhan dag 'dzud pa ni// 'di ni de bzhin ka ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// snying rjes brlan sems
358a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mang las 'grol// bla med bla ma khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// ma tum sems can la chos gag 'chad pa ni// bdag po 'jig rten na yang de spyad
358a6(mdo sde): dka'// shin tu rgya che ba'i 'khor 'di dang // phyogasu rnam par grags pa'i sangs rgyas sras// chos kyi mi ngoms rgya mtsho 'dra ba tshogs// de dag la ni rgyal ba'i
358a7(mdo sde): byang chub gsungs// tshangs pa dbang po 'jig rten skyong ba dang // lha kla lha min mi 'am cir bcas pa// chos nyid 'tshal ba mang po tshogs pa la// ci ltar
358a8(mdo sde): mos pa bzhin du chos nyid gsungs// dge snyen dge bsnyen ma dang dge slong dang // dge slong ma dang 'khor bzhi 'di dag tshogs// ji ltar thos nas nor
358a9(mdo sde): grub rab 'dong bar// de ltar de dag la ni chos stan gsal// gang rnams sangs rgyas theg la rtag mos dang // de bzhin rang rgyal theg dang nyan thos theg/ thub pa
358b1(mdo sde): gang gis sems bsam gang mkhyen pa// de la sman pa'i slad du de gsungs shig/ sangs rgyas rigs la gnas phyir gang zhugs pa// dkon mchog gsum po gad
358b2(mdo sde): las byung ba yi// byang chub sems dag la sman slad du// chos kyi rgyal po khyad la bdag gsol// khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba grangs thos nas// shes rab
358b3(mdo sde): yangs pa 'di rnams bde bar lhags// sems can gtso ba de dag mkhyen pa bzhin// de dag ni bla med spyod bshed// 'di ltar bde gshegs mkhyen pa bsam
358b4(mdo sde): mi khyag/ dgra bcom bdag nyid chen pos 'di min// 'di ni rang rgyal gyi yang yul ma lags// bdag kyang 'dren pa'i rje su 'brang // bdag gis gang khyod
358b5(mdo sde): don chen 'di bris pa// 'jig rten rnams 'dren khyod la bdag bzod gsol// gang phyir khyed kyi thugs ni skyo mi mnga'// de phyir byang chub lam mchog bstan
358b6(mdo sde): du gsolade nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
358b7(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan zhing / yid mi skyo ba rnams legs// bcom ldan
358b8(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgo gcig tu smra zhing tshig gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags// ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon
359a1(mdo sde): bar 'phags pa rnams lags// ji ltar na slad ma mchis shing // spyod lam yang mi 'khrugs pa lags// ji ltar na chos kar
359a2(mdo sde): po rnams rnam par 'phel bar bgyid pa rnams lags// ji ltar na sa nas sar 'bar bar bgyid pa lags// ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba
359a3(mdo sde): la thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar sems can rnams la nye bar spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems srung ba rnams
359a4(mdo sde): lags// ji ltar na sems rtse gcig cing yid rnam par ma 'dres pa rnams lags// ji ltar na chos rnams yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams lags// /
359a5(mdo sde): ji ltar lta ltung ba las 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul ba la mkhas pa lags// ji ltar na 'khor gyi nang
359a6(mdo sde): du mchi be la mchis pa rnams lags// ji ltar na chos rnams par byed pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na rgyu'i stobs dang ldan zhing // dge
359a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba chab mi 'tshal ba rnams lags// ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bstan par sbyin pa dang // de bzhin du shes rab kyi bar du bstan
359a8(mdo sde): ba rnams lags// ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi bde ba las ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi
359b1(mdo sde): ldog pa rnams lags// ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi bcod pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad
359b2(mdo sde): par sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa leg so leg so// yang tshangs pa khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la de lta bu'i dri bar sems pa leg so// tshangs pa
359b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legaso zhes gsol nas// tshangs pa khyad par sems bcom ldan 'das kyi
359b4(mdo sde): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag lhag pa'i
359b5(mdo sde): bsam pa brtan zhing yid mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mi skye ba'i brtson 'grus dang / 'khor ba la rmi lam lta bur
359b6(mdo sde): mos pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par yongs su 'jal ba ste/ tshangs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems
359b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dag lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan cing yid mi skyo ba rnams yin no// tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mag
359b8(mdo sde): cig tu smra zhing tshig du nga ba med pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la gang zag med par mgo gcig tu smra'o//
360a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye gnas thams cad la dga' ba med par mgo gcig tu smra'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i
360a2(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i mgo gcig tu smra'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams chud mi za bar mge gcig tu smra'o// tshangs pa de dag ni byang
360a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mgo gcig pa bzhi pa'o// tshangs pa chos bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
360a4(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gteng ba dang / 'byung ba ste/ bzhi pa 'di dag gi/
360a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems mi bslab cing sbed lam rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsnyes pa med pa dang //
360a6(mdo sde): snad pa med pa dang / grags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshangs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi bslas
360a7(mdo sde): cang spod lam// rnam par mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chos gzhi dang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar
360a8(mdo sde): byed de glang she na/ sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag pa 'jud pa dang / sbyin pa byin nas rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / dam pa'i ches yongs su
360b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes rab ston pa ste// bzhi po 'di dag go// tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub seMs dpa seMs dpa' chen po
360b2(mdo sde): rnams sa nas sar 'phar te// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa dang / nyes pa thams cad rnam par spong ba dang / bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang / brtson 'grus
360b3(mdo sde): shin tu 'bar ba dang / bzhi po 'di dge/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sen po rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la
360b4(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / gzhan gyi bsod nams la rjes su yid rang ba dang / nyes pa 'chag
360b5(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
360b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la nye bar spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams yin to// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang / bdag bde ba la chags pa dang
360b7(mdo sde): bzod cing nges pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ byang chub
360b8(mdo sde): kyi sems chud mi gson te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la/ byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams lnga byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge
361a1(mdo sde): @#// ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / theg pa chen po yang dag par bsngags te// bzhi po 'di dag go// tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
361a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams sems rtse gcig cing yid rnam par ma 'dres pa rnam su rig par bye ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems rnam par sreng ba dang / rang
361a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa gtong ba dang / chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / ji ltar bres pa bzhin du chos bston pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// tshangs
361a4(mdo sde): pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos yongs su tshel te// bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed dka' ba'i phyir rin po cher 'du shes pa dang / nad
361a5(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir/ rtsir 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'du shes pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dge/ tshangs pa
361a6(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ltung ba las 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang nas mi skye ba'i chos
361a7(mdo sde): la bzad ba dang / mi ba zas mi 'gag pa la bzod pa dang / rgyu lam ser rtog pas nyes cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bzod pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu sems/
361a8(mdo sde): bar tshun gyur pa ste/ bzhi pa 'di dag tshangs pa ches bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyang ste/ glang zhen/
361b1(mdo sde): tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ni sdom pa dang / dkar po'i chos kyi stobs skyed pa dang / rab tu dben par gnas pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dgo/ tshangs pa
361b2(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor gyi nang na 'gro ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir te/ glan ka tshol
361b3(mdo sde): ba'i bsam pas ma yin pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pa'i phyir te/ nga rgyal dang khengs pas ma yin pa dang / dge ba'i gang yin pa tshol ba'i phyir te/ bdag sgom pasaM
361b4(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba la bzud pa'i phyir te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste// bzhi po 'di dge/
361b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed// bzhi gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
361b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / bdag nyid kyi shes rab gsal bar byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i las byed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ston
361b7(mdo sde): pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rgyu'i stebs dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i rtsa
361b8(mdo sde): ba chud mi za ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khrug pa la nyes par mi lta ba dang / khros pa rnams la byams pa sgom pa dang / chos rnams kyi rgyu sten
362a1(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
362a2(mdo sde): rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma bstan par shes pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin bdag la sngon du 'gro ba rnams yin te/ ltung ba rnams kyi pha
362a3(mdo sde): rol la rtsod par mi byed/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dngos po la mkhas pa yin/ ches rnams la zab mor mos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi po 'di
362a4(mdo sde): dgo/ tshangs pa ches bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan la gnas nas/ 'dod pa'i kham su skye'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ seMs
362a5(mdo sde): las su rung ste/ dge ba'i rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang / thabs dang shes rab sgom pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ste/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub
362a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongasu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas
362a7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / byams pa dpag tu med pa sgom pa dang / snying rje dpag tu med pasgom pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dgo/ tshangs pa chos bzhi dang
362a8(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngar dam bcas pa las ma 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
